El socio nació en la ciudad de Huarocondo de la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 45 años de edad, ella está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene seis hijos.

Actualmente, El socio vive en la ciudad de donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades comerciales. El es artesano picapedrero pues elaborar lozas, adoquines, sardineles, lajas menudas y otras cosas en base de piedra. El pertenece a la Asociación de Picapedreros de la Comunidad de Huarocondo. Ya son 20 años que se dedica a este actividad y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad el socio requiere el préstamo para comprar herramientas como por ejemplo amoladoras, carretillas, diamantes y otras cosas más.
texts.en:
This borrower is a responsible and hard-working person who, owing to these personal qualities, was invited by his friends to join Asociación Arariwa's "Las Natividades" community bank.

The borrower was born in the city of Huarocondo, in Anta province, in Cusco department, Peru.  He is 45 years old, married, and has six children.

The borrower currently lives in the city in which he was born and this is where he carries out his business.  He is an artisan stonemason who makes flagstones, cobbles, curbstones, small slabs and other stone-based products.  He is a member of Huarocondo community's Association of Stonemasons.  He has been in this business for 20 years and is doing very well thanks to the effort that he puts into his work.

On this occasion, the borrower needs a loan to buy tools such as grinders, wheelbarrows, etc.

loans.use: to buy tools

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es: Ángela Maria tiene 45 años. Tiene la actividad económica que es brindar el servicio de nutrición. Hace más de 3 años que se dedica a este negocio. Ella tomo cursos de nutrición y decide establecer este negocio con fondos propios. El dinero que solicita es para comprar productos naturales, pastillas, jarabes, pomadas entre otros. En sus deseos esta el seguir manteniendo este negocio ya que es su único medio de vida.
texts.en: Ángela Maria is 45 years old.  Her business activity is providing a nutrition service.  She has been in this business for more than three years.  She took courses in nutrition and decided to set up her business with her own funds.  She is requesting this money to buy natural products, pills, syrups, ointments, etc.  Her wish is to continue running her business as it is her only means of earning income.

loans.use: to buy natural products, pills, syrups and ointments

loans.name: Maria De La Paz

texts.es:
María, es comerciante, vive con su esposo y tiene una hija, ella vende verduras y frutas en el mercado municipal, su horario de venta es de 6:00am a 6:00pm y lo inicio hace 21 años, hoy en día cuenta con experiencia y ha logrado sobrevivir del negocio.
Ella está solicitando préstamo para la compra de repollo, tomates, cebolla, plátanos, yuca, estas verduras son parte de las que ofrece a los clientes, él financiamiento le ayudara para mantener de toda clase de verduras frescas, para atender la demanda.
Su objetivo es realizar una buena inversión con el préstamo, impulsar aun más el negocio, continuando con el buen servicio a los clientes y proveyendo ganancias para su hogar.
texts.en: María is a saleswoman.  She lives with her husband and has one daughter.  She sells fruit and vegetables in the town market, making her sales from 6.00am to 6.00pm.  María started her business 21 years ago.  She now has experience and has managed to survive in her business.  She is requesting this loan to buy cabbage, tomatoes, plantains and yucca.  These vegetables are some of those which she sells to her customers.  This loan will help her to keep all kinds of fresh vegetables in stock so that she can meet her customer demand.  Her goals are to make a good investment with her loan, to further boost her business, to continue providing her customers with a good service and to make profits for her household.

loans.use: to buy cabbage, tomatoes, onions, plantains and cassava

loans.name: Colinas De Poteca Group

texts.en:
Mirna, Eloisa and Dimara, all of whom reside in Trojes, Honduras, formed the “Colinas de Poteca” solidarity group in June, 2011. 

Mirna has made a living by running a small convenience shop for the past two years, selling basic food and other household products. To earn additional income Mirna sells Avon cosmetics on the side. 

She is currently requesting a loan of HNL 10,000 to purchase merchandise for her convenience shop. 

Eloisa sells homemade baked goods for a living and Dimara has a small clothing business.

loans.use: to purchase many assorted items for the general store.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras De Las Colinas Group

texts.es:
El comité denominaron Mujeres  Emprendedoras de las Colinas esta conformado por vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Asunción. Todas ellas se organizaron y decidieron formarse. Actualmente cuenta con 16 integrantes, todas ellas manifiestan que están muy a gusto dentro del grupo.
Ellas se definen como mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras. Cuentan que lo que las llevo a unirse fue el deseo de que puedan llevar a sus casa mayores ingresos y así mejorar un poco su nivel de vida.
La Sra. Emma es una modista. Ella se dedica a esta profesión desde hace ya varios años, es muy conocida en su barrio y ya tiene una clientela bien formada. Dice que todo el trabajo que ella realiza es con miras a ayudar a sus familiares y así poder tener una mayor estabilidad económica.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de los insumos que utilizara en su profesión, como telas, hilos, sets de agujas y demás.
texts.en:
This committee is called 'Mujeres Emprendedoras de las Colinas' and it is made up of neighbors and friends from the city of Asunción.  The women got together and decided to form a group which currently has 16 members.  All of the members say that they are very happy to be part of the group.

The group's members describe themselves as very hard-working and tenacious women.  They say that what led them to come together and form a group was the desire that they had to make more income for their households and improve their standard of living a little.

Emma is a dressmaker.  She has been in this business for several years.  She is very well known in her neighborhood and has a well established customer base.  She says that she does all of her work with a view to helping her family members and creating more financial stability.

Emma is requesting this loan to buy supplies that she uses in her profession such as fabric, threads, needle sets and other products.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, needles, etc.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven que se ha rebuscado la forma de generar ingresos, pues se considera un hombre emprendedor y luchador. Es así como desde hace un año decidió pararse en una calle del centro del Área Metropolitana de Medellín, y vender comidas rápidas a los habitantes del sector ya que no hay otros negocios como este.

Desde entonces Daniel se ha dedicado a brindar un servicio agradable y confiable a sus clientes. Él sueña con convertir su negocio en un puesto de comida reconocido en la ciudad, pero para ello es consciente que debe trabajar mucho y esforzarse cada vez más; por ahora necesita de un préstamo para comprar insumos y hacerle mantenimiento al lugar de trabajo para que sus productos sean de buena calidad e higiene. Es así como poco a poco sus ganancias se incrementarán y podrá tener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Daniel is a young man who has searched for ways to generate income because he considers himself to be an enterprising, tenacious man.  This is how he decided a year ago to stand on a street in the middle of the Medellín Metropolitan Area to sell fast food to the area residents since there is no business similar to this one.

Since then, Daniel has provided kind and dependable service to his customers.  He dreams with his business becoming a food stand that’s known throughout the city.  To do so, he’s aware that he must work very much and put more effort into it daily.  For now, he needs a loan to buy ingredients and to do some maintenance in the work place so that his products will be of good quality and hygienic.  This way his profits will increase and he will be able to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and to maintain his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stock items for his store.

loans.name: Bertha Adilia

texts.es: Bertha Adilia tiene 55 años, su actividad económica es una pulpería. Actualmente tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad. Ella realiza esta actividad hace 6 años, cuando empezó a vender por la razón de que ella se encontraba sin un trabajo estable y por medio de sus propios esfuerzos logro establecer el negocio, el cual está ubicado en su vivienda en donde tiene muchos clientes. Ella solicita el financiamiento para comprar de granos básicos, golosinas, refrescos, enlatados, sopas,  frutas y papel higiénico. Bertha desea que todos los esfuerzos ha realizado no sean en vanos y sus hijos puedan continuar con el negocio.
texts.en: Bertha Adilia, 55, has a grocery store.  She has three adult children.  She’s been in business six years.   She started selling because she did not have a steady job and through her own efforts managed to establish the business which is located in her home where she has many customers.  She is asking for the loan to buy basic grains, snacks, beverages, canned goods, soups, fruit and toilet paper.  Bertha hopes that all the effort she's expended has not been in vain and that her children will be able to carry on with the business.

loans.use: to buy stock items for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es: Alicia tiene 37 años, esta casada con Germán de 40 años y fruto de esta relación tienen 3 pequeños hijos que están en etapa escolar. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de puerto mayo del distrito de Pichari. Alicia sabe lo difícil que es para una familia de pocos recursos salir adelante. Es así que junto a  su familia trabajaron sin para y en diversas actividades. En un inicio empezó a trabajar como peón junto a su marido en las labores agrícolas. Han transcurrido 10 años, encontró algo que la apasiona, que es la producción cacao, café y cítricos e incluso de frutos injertados. Con el tiempo obtuvo ganancias y eso la motiva a continuar e intensificarse en esta actividad, con el fin de ofrecerle un bienestar a su familia. En un futuro desde adquirir un terreno para luego construir su casa propia que tanto anhela. Este es su primer crédito con MFP por el que ella se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. Los 1.500 nuevos soles que solicitó lo invertirá en la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Alicia is 37 years old.  She’s married to Germán, 40, and they have three small children who are school age.  They live together in their own house located in the community of Puerto Mayo in Pichari District.  

Alicia knows how difficult it is for a family of limited resources to get ahead.  Because of this together with her family they work nonstop and in a variety of activities.  At the beginning she started working as a day field worker together with her husband doing farming chores.  

Ten years have passed and she’s found something that she’s passionate about, which is cocoa bean, coffee, citrus fruit and even grafted fruit production.  In time she obtained profits and this motivates her to continue and intensify this activity with the goal in mind of providing wellbeing for her family.  

In the future she’d like to acquire a piece of land to build the house she so desires.  This is her first loan with MFP so she commits to be punctual with her installment payments.  She will use the requested 1500 new soles to buy organic manure.

loans.use: to buy sacks of organic manure.

loans.name: Loma Guazu Group

texts.es:
Las mujeres del presente comité son de la Ciudad de Caacupé. Las Señoras son mujeres muy trabajadoras, y responsables, cumplen a cabalidad con sus compromisos. Todas ellas son vecinas y amigas de esa ciudad.
Ellas manifiestan que se formaron y organizaron con un único fin, que es el de dar u ofrecer a sus familias una mejor vida, y también que puedan acceder a un nivel por lo menos del mínimo de educación.
La Sra. Juana se dedica a la elaboración de artesanías, cuenta que desde pequeña su madre le había enseñado como hacer sus piezas. Está muy orgullosa de su trabajo y que por medio de su trabajo ha podido mantener a su familia.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de los materiales que va a utilizar para la elaboración de sus artesanías, como ser telas, hilos, tintes y demás. Ella esta muy esperanzada en el credito ya que sabe que le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The women of this committee are from the city of Caacupé.  The ladies are very hard working and responsible and they fully meet their obligations.  They are all neighbors and friends from this city.

The ladies say that they got together and formed their committee with one goal: to be able to offer their families a better life and to be able to offer them at least a minimal level of education.

Juana makes handicrafts.  She tells us that her mother taught her to make handicrafts from a young age.  She is very proud of her work and, through her work, she has been able to support her family.  Juana is requesting this loan to buy the materials that she will use to make her handicrafts such as fabric, threads, dyes, etc.

Juana is placing a lot of hope in her loan as she knows that it will be very useful to her.

loans.use: to buy fabric, threads, dyes and other products for making handicrafts

loans.name: Ruben Dario

texts.es:
Ruben Dario es un emprendedor que se ha rebuscado la forma de generar ingresos, pues de él depende su hijo al cual espera sacar adelante y ofrecerle un mejor futuro. Es así como desde hace año y medio decidió emprender un nuevo negocio, una tienda ubicada en el centro del municipio de Medellín en el departamento de Antioquia, donde trabaja con esmero para mejorar su ingresos y tener una mejor calidad de vida.

Ruben sueña con convertir su negocio en un minimercado, pero para ello es consciente que debe trabajar diariamente y esforzarse cada vez más; por ahora necesita de un préstamo para adecuar la fachada de su negocio y así posesionar el negocio dándole mejor presencia al establecimiento, logrando que sus clientes reconozcan y prefieran su microempresa por ser agradable, ofrecer gran variedad de productos y brindar un servicio amable y efectivo.
texts.en:
Rubén Darío is an entrepreneur who has sought out ways to generate income because he has a son that depends on him and he hopes to raise him and provide a better future for him.   This is how he’s been working for a year and a half in a new business: a store located in downtown Medellín, Antioquia Department, where he works with dedication to improve his income and to have a better quality of life.

Rubén dreams with converting his store into a minimarket but he’s aware that to do so he must work hard and try even harder each time.  For now, he needs a loan to furnish the façade of his store to provide it with an improved appearance to have better presence in the marketplace so that his customers will recognize him and prefer his micro business for being pleasant, for offering a great variety of products and for its kind and effective service.

loans.use: to furnish the locale his micro business is located in.

loans.name: Mariana De Jesus

texts.es:
Mariana de Jesus tiene 40 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con dos hijos de 12 y 13 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Mariana se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas de maiz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades.Enfrenta desafios como la sequia y plagas en los cultivo. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y hacer la casa para la familia.

Le gusta estar pendiente de la casa y trabajar mucho.
texts.en:
Mariana de Jesús is 40 years old.  She’s married and lives with her husband and two children who are 12 and 13 years of age in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.

The members of “El Progreso” (Progress) communal bank are located in Aguas Frías de Mocache belonging to Mocache Canton and are short cycle corn and rice farmers.

Mariana is a rice and corn farmer.  She buys her supplies at Comercial Peña and sells at the Ventanas wholesale market.

She is asking for the loan to plant corn and rice, to buy farming supplies and corn and rice seeds.  Support from the loan will help her economically to meet her needs.  The challenges she faces are draught and plant diseases.  Her dream is to buy a piece of land and build a house for the family.

She likes watching over her house and to work a lot.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and corn and rice seeds.

loans.name: Marisol

texts.en:
Marisol is an individual loan client with Esperanza. She is located in a rural area surrounding Hato Mayor, an agricultural area. She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner and their three children.

Marisol is excited to be taking her 7th loan with Esperanza after taking having successfully repaid her previous loan, which helped her to expand her business. After 6 loans Marisol had been able to grow her business and improve her family incomingo. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business to buy rice, flour and other foods. Her business is a "colmado", a place where you can find all the ingredients to make your daily food. Normally those "colmado"s are in the same neighborhood, a short distance on foot from any home. 

She will use the profits to invest in her business. Some of the profit will also be saved. Her most important and difficult challenge is to pay for her son's university fees. That is difficult because the cost is very high, but she thanks God to have her business and generate extra income. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: to buy rice, flour and other foods.

loans.name: Cruz Mercedes

texts.es:
Cruz Mercedes tiene 22 años, Es soltera vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 1 hijo de un año.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Cruz Mercedes se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y en pocas cantidades cacao . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes y para invertir en siembra de cacao.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la falta de dinero para seguir invirtiendo. Su sueño es ayudar a la familia economicamente y terminar la carrera universitaria.

Le gusta hacer ejercicio, nadar y bailar.
texts.en:
Cruz Mercedes is 22 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She has a one year-old child.

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache province.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Cruz Mercedes is a farmer who grows corn, rice and small quantities of cacao.  She buys her products in Comercial Peña and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Cruz Mercedes is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  She will buy supplies and fertilizers, and will invest in her cacao crop.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges in her business such as a lack of money to invest.  Her dream is to help her family financially and to finish her university studies.

Cruz Mercedes enjoys exercising, swimming and dancing.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers and to invest in her cacao crops

loans.name: Maria Jeaneth

texts.es:
Jeaneth  es reconocida en la zona por ser una gran mujer, esto porque es caracterizada por su  entrega y lucha a la comunidad.
Ella está solicitando en este momento un préstamo de ₡ 400 000 (cuatrocientos mil colones)  para la compra de una computadora portátil  y de una impresora para facilitar las operaciones de crédito de la empresita. 
Ella asegura que la demanda de crédito a aumentado muchísimo y que por eso es necesario brindar un mejor servicio para obtener  tramites más eficientes para que con ello, la empresita crezca cada día más y al igual que las familias de la comunidad.
Jeaneth es parte de la junta directiva de la empresa de Crédito Comunal de Hatillo S.A
texts.en:
Jeaneth is known throughout the zone for being a great woman because she’s noted for her dedication and advocacy for her community.
At present, she is asking for this ₡ 400 000 (four-hundred thousand colones) loan to buy a portable computer and a printer to facilitate the bank’s loan operations.

She assures that demand for loans has increased very much and that’s why it’s necessary to provide better service to complete transactions more efficiently so that the bank will grow more each day as well as the families in the community.

Jeaneth is part of the governing board of the Hatillo S.A. communal bank.

loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Elizabethe De Los Angeles

texts.es: Elizabethe De Los Ángeles tiene 24 años, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa hace mas de 5 años que ella recorre los diferentes lugares a ofrecer sus productos. Ella inicio esta actividad cuando nació su hijo y no tenia los ingresos necesarios para mantenerlo, al inicio no tenía mucha experiencia pero compro lo que sus clientes más le solicitaban como trajes para niños, vestidos, pantalones entre otras cosas así fue que poco a poco ella fue progresando con este negocio. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes para niños, sabanas y camisetas. Su deseo es proporcionarle una  muy buena educación a su hijo.
texts.en:
Elizabethe De Los Ángeles is 24 years old.  She has been selling clothes for more than five years.  She travels to different places to sell her products.  She started out in this business when her son was born and she didn't have the income she needed to support him.  At first she didn't have much experience but she bought what her customers were most requesting such as children's outfits, dresses, pants, etc.  In this way, she gradually made progress in the business.

Elizabethe is requesting this loan to buy pants, shirts, skirts, children's outfits, sheets and t-shirts.  Her wish is to provide her son with a very good education.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, children's outfits, sheets and t-shirts

loans.name: Marcos Benedo

texts.es:
Marcos Benedo tiene 30 años, Es soltero vive con solo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. Tiene 3 hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Marco se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz por mas de 5 años. Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es comprar un carro y tener casa propia.

Le gusta hacer deporte y visitar a los hijos.
texts.en:
Marcos Benedo is 30 years old.  He’s single and lives alone in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He has three children.

The members of the “El Progreso” (Progress) communal bank are located in Aguas Frías de Mocache belonging to Mocache Canton and are dedicated to short cycle corn and rice farming tasks.

Marco has been farming corn and rice for over five years.  He buys his supplies at Comercial Peña and sells at the Ventanas wholesale market.

He is asking for the loan to plant corn and rice, to buy farming supplies and fertilizer for his crops.  Support from the loan will help him economically to meet his needs.  His dream is to buy a car and have a house of his own.

He enjoys playing sports and visiting his children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Leydis Areli

texts.es:
Leydis, vive con su esposo y dos hijos D. 8 y 19 años D. edad, se dedica a la venta D. ropa, su almacén se llama La casa D. la Moda, la mercadería que ofrece es fabricada por ella, son en su mayoría vestidos D. boda y D. quinceañera, así como recuerdos para eventos sociales, este negocio tiene varios años D. existir.
Ella actualmente solicita un financiamiento para comprar telas finas para vestidos elegantes, artículos D. decoración tanto para vestidos como para hacer recuerdos.
Este préstamo le ayudara mucho ya que comprara todo lo necesario para confeccionar y ofrecer a los clientes y mantenerse competente dentro del mercado, aumentado sus ventas y sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Leydis lives with her husband and two children, ages 8 and 19.  She sells clothing in her shop which is called "La casa D. la Moda" (the house of fashion).  She sews her own merchandise, which consists mainly of wedding dresses or dresses for debutante celebrations, as well as social event souvenirs.  She has been in business for several years.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy special fabric for elegant dresses and dress trims.

The loan will help her buy everything she needs for her sewing business so she can stay competitive within the market and increase sales and earnings.

loans.use: To buy fabric and dress trims.

loans.name: Marta Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha es una emprendedora que desde hace 4 años tiene su propio negocio donde le ofrece a su comunidad productos de la canasta familiar y otros productos, trabaja en su tienda de lunes a viernes de 7:00 a.m. a 10:00 p.m. y los fines de semana hasta las 2:00 de la madrugada ya que es un buen horario para realizar ventas de licor y otros productos. 

Su mayor sueño es poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la des sus 2 hijos, y para ello sabe que debe procurar tener una microempresa que le agrade a sus clientes y al resto de la comunidad, por lo que se preocupa por brindar un buen servicio y tener los productos necesarios que hacen parte de la canasta familiar y por este motivo es que hoy en día Marta solicita un préstamo con el cual puedo comprar el surtido de contado y obtener un descuento generoso que le genere mas utilidades a sus ventas.
texts.en:
Marta is an entrepreneur who has been in business for four years.  She has a grocery store and offers her community products required for daily consumption and other items.  Her store is open from 7:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. and on weekends until 2:00 a.m., which is a good time to sell liquor and other products.

Her greatest goal is to improve her two children's lifestyle and her own.  In order to do this she knows she must have a small business that is popular with her customers and the rest of the community.  She makes an effort to provide the best service possible and have on hand the necessary products for daily consumption.  Martha is requesting a loan to buy a variety of products in cash and obtain a significant discount so her profits will increase.

loans.use: To buy varied products for her store.

loans.name: Marilu

texts.es:
La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Las Natividades” de la Asociación Arariwa.

La socia nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba de la provincia de la Convención del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 19 años de edad. Actualmente, la socia vive en la ciudad de Huarocondo y donde desarrolla sus actividades comerciales. Ella trabajó en la municipalidad de Huarocondo en el área de administración de desarrollo de económico como asistente. La socia ahora está estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración en el Instituto Superior ESITUP y ya está terminado. 

La socia y su mamá tienen un negocio familiar de venta de cerveza pues tienen un depósito donde se puede comprar la bebida las 24 horas del día. Ya son 4 meses que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. En esta oportunidad la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar cerveza pues se está acercando las fiestas de la Virgen del Carmen.
texts.en:
Marilu is a responsible, hard-working person who, because of these traits, was invited by her friends to participate in the communal bank "Las Natividades" which belongs to the Arariwa Association.

She was born in the city of Quillabamba in the province of La Convención in the department of Cusco (Perú).  She is 19 years old and currently lives in the city of Huarocondo where she carries out her commercial activities.  She has worked in the municipality of Huarocondo as an assistant in the area of administration of economic development.  Currently she is studying for a degree at the ESITUP Superior Institute of Administration, and is almost finished.

Together with her mother, Marilu runs a business selling beer and has a 24-hour dispensing depot.  She has been in business for four months, and it is going well thanks to all her hard work.  She is requesting a loan to buy beer because of the upcoming festivities of Our Lady of Mount Carmel.

loans.use: To buy beer.

loans.name: Javier

texts.es: Javier  tiene 56 años de edad, convive con Aidé de 56 años, juntos tiene 2 hijos, ellos viven en la comunidad de puerto mayo del distrito de Pichari. Javier es un hombre que no se conforma con lo que tiene, el es profesor del nivel primario del centro educativo de Puerto Mayo. Pero desde que era pequeño sus padres le enseñaron a producir y labrar la tierra. Es así que luego que culminaran sus estudios de pedagogía,  él y su esposa adquirieron una parcela para cultivar cacao, con la finalidad de no dejar lo que sus padres le enseñaron. Sin embargo él desea generar más ganancias para su familia, por tanto espera abrir una tienda de abarrotes, ya que con el tiempo no tendrá la vitalidad de continuar trabajando en el campo. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, y por tal espera el apoyo de todos ustedes. En su banco comunal es un hombre que siempre impone el orden. Con los 1.000 nuevos soles que solicita, lo invertirá para contratar peones para que limpien y fertilicen sus plantaciones de cacao.
texts.en:
Javier, 56, lives with Aidé, 56, and their two children in the community of Puerto Mayo in the district of Pichari.  Javier is a man who works hard to improve his lifestyle.  He is a primary level teacher at the Puerto Mayo educational center.  But from a very early age he was taught by his parents to plow the fields and produce crops.  After finishing his education degree, he and his wife bought a patch of land to grow cocoa so he would not forget everything his parents taught him.  

No he wants to earn more income for his family so he hopes to open a grocery store for the day when he does not have the energy to continue working in the fields.  This is his second loan through MFP and his is counting on your support.  In his communal bank he is the one who always imposes order.  With the loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN he plans to hire workers to clean and fertilize his cocoa plantations.

loans.use: To hire workers.

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel Angel tiene 25 años, Es soltero vive con la madre tiene un hijo pero no vive con el, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Miguel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes .   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es comprar terrenos para cultivar.

Le gusta dormir .
texts.en:
Miguel Angel, 25, is single and lives with his mother in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.  He has a son who does not live with him.

The communal bank V.R.C. EL PROGRESO is located in the Aguas Frías de Mocache community, which belongs to the Mocache Canton.  This group is involved in short-cycle corn and rice crop growing.

Miguel grows corn and rice, and buys what he needs in Comercial Pena and sells his produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer to begin planting.  This will help him economically to purchase what he needs.  His goal for the future is to buy crop land.

He enjoys sleeping.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Pastor

texts.es:
El Sr. Pastor es de la ciudad de Santani, tiene 46 años de edad, esta casado con la Sra. Vicencia con 38 años de edad. Actualmente tienen 4 Hijos, todos mayores de edad, trabajan independiente.
El Sr. Pastor posee una despensa hace ya varios años. El ya cuenta con una clientela formada, buen ingreso, buenas referencias comerciales y personales.El se define como un hombre muy trabajador y luchador, toda su vida ha trabajado y no tiene miedo a seguir haciéndolo. Por medio de su trabajo ha logrado sacar adelante a todos sus hijos, por lo cual se siente muy orgulloso.
El solicita el credito para el abastecimiento de su local con comestible, bebidas, embutidos y demás, ya que su stock de mercaderías esta y un poco reducido y sabe que con mas productos podrá atraer nueva clientela. El tiene las esperanzas puestas en su credito ya que sabe que le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Pastor is from the city of Santani, he is 46 years old and is married to Vicencia who is 38 years old.  They have 4 children, all of whom are adults and work independently.  Pastor has owned a grocery store for several years now, he relies on an established clientele, good income, good commercial and personal references.  He defines himself as a hard-working and fighting man.  He has worked all of his life and is not afraid to continue doing so.  Through his work he has been able to get his kids ahead which makes him very proud.
He solicits the loan to restock his store with groceries, drinks, sausages, and more since his current stock has been reduced.  Pastor knows that with more products he could attract new customers.  He has his hopes set on this loan because he knows it would be of great help.

loans.use: to purchase groceries, drinks, and sausages

loans.name: Juan

texts.en:
Juan requires a loan to buy diverse vegetables, such as salad ingredients, potatoes, cassava, plantains, bananas, sweet potatoes and others. He has been running his business for forty years. Juan lives in the Hato Mayor region of the Dominican Republic, located in the eastern part of the country. Hato Mayor is a fairly mountainous region where the principal industry is agriculture.

Juan has taken out seven loans with field partner Esperanza International over the past five years; all of which have been paid back in full. He has used these loans to diversify the products that he sells. He is very excited about taking out this loan so that he can continue to grow his business.

Juan says that his favorite thing is working. He enjoys doing business, and his most important challenge is to build a house. He is the father of eight children. Almost all are grown, and he is living with one of them. He hopes that with his business profits he will be able to save and make his dreams come true, to have his own house.

loans.use: to buy vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Narciso

texts.es: El señor Narciso nacido  en Chuquisaca el convive con su pareja hace ya mucho tiempo,  tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar,  El trabaja agricultura tiene su parcela en Villa Esperanza a 25 km de Santa Rita, el siembra maíz, yuca, arroz, también tiene una hectárea de cítrico como ser mandarina, naranja, también tiene ganado todo su producto que el saca lo vende en el mercado de la zona, en cuanto a ganado saca a la venta de 10 á 12 torillos, le va muy bien en las distintas actividades que realiza, con el dinero del crédito comprara semillas para la siembra de maíz y también lo utilizara en el preparado de la tierra para su siembra, es una persona joven con ganas de superación agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Narciso was born in Chuquisaca and has lived with his partner for a long time.  The couple have three school-age children.

Narciso is a farmer.  He has a plot of land in Villa Esperanza, 25km from Santa Rita, where he grows corn, cassava and rice, and also has a hectare of citrus fruits such as mandarins and oranges.  In addition, he keeps livestock.  He takes all his products to sell in the market in his area.  As regards the livestock, he sells 10 - 12 young bulls.  He is doing very well in the different business activities that he carries out.  He will use his loan money to buy seeds for growing corn and will also use some for preparing the land for sowing.  Narciso is a young person who has a desire to do well.  He is grateful to the institution for the support they have provided.

loans.use: to burn land in preparation for sowing and to sow corn and cassava

loans.name: Marta Alicia

texts.es:
Marta, es viuda, vive con sus dos hijas, tiene casa propia, se dedica a la venta D. medicinas y granja D. pollos, este negocio lo heredo hace cinco años D. su esposo, actualmente lo administra muy bien y sus hijas le ayudan.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería para el negocio D. medicinas, comprando pastillas, jarabes, inyecciones para distintas enfermedades así como también vitaminas y reanimantes, al mismo tiempo quiere comprar concentrado para la granja D. pollos.
Ella es una mujer trabajadora que siempre busca las alternativas para progresar en el negocio y ayudar a sus hijas, su propósito es tener un negocio rentable.
texts.en:
Marta is a widow and lives with her two daughters in her own home.  She sells medicines and owns a chicken farm.  She inherited the latter business from her husband five years ago.  She currently runs it very well and her daughters help her.  

Marta needs a loan to buy merchandise for her business selling medicines.  She will buy pills, syrups and injections for different illnesses and also vitamins and stimulants.  In addition, she would like to buy concentrated feed for her chicken farm.

Marta is a hard-working woman who is always looking for ways to make progress in her business and help her daughters.  Her goal is to own a profitable business.

loans.use: to buy syrups, injections, pills, and also concentrated feed for her chicken farm

loans.name: Blanca Hortencia

texts.es:
Blanca Hortecia tiene 21 años, Es soltera vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Blanca se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes .   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la falta de dinero para seguir invirtiendo. Su sueño es hacer mi carro.

Le gusta tranajar en la agricultura y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Blanca Hortecia is 21 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  She doesn't have any children.

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Blanca is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in Comercial Peña and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Blanca is requesting this loan to grown corn and rice.  She will buy supplies and fertilizers.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges in her business such as a lack of money to invest.  Her dream is to own a car.

Blanca enjoys farming and taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Candy Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Candy es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 28 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.
Lleva tres años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de comida y lo hace en el caserío donde vive, su esposo se desempeña como  chofer (transportista).
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprará: 1 mesa con cuatro sillas, 6 jarras de vidrio, 1 docena de vasos, 1 mantel, 2 ollas medianas, 1 freidora.
Trabajando así puede ayudar a su esposo y también puede comprar lo que necesita, el dinero que su esposo gana en el día se lo entrega para que lo distribuya adecuadamente en los casos más urgentes y las necesidades básicas. Manuela Ramos es parte de su familia gracias a los préstamos recibidos su economía ha mejorado.
texts.en:
Candy is a member of the 'Manos Maravillosas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 28 years old, married, and has two children.

Candy has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for three years.  Her business is selling food and she carries out her business in the small village where she lives.  Her husband is a driver (haulage contractor).

With this new loan for 1,700 Peruvian soles, Candy will buy 1 table with 4 chairs, 6 glass pitchers, 1 dozen glasses, 1 tablecloth, 2 medium-sized pans and 1 fryer.

By working in this way, Candy is able to help her husband and also buy what she needs.  Her husband hands her the money he makes each day so that she can distribute it properly where it is needed most and cover their basic needs.  Manuela Ramos is part of her family.  Thanks to the loans that she has received, her financial situation has improved.

loans.use: to buy a table and chairs

loans.name: G.s. Santiaga Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama Santiaga, las integrantes del grupo Dora y Matilde. Doña Dora se decidió por ese negocio, ya que dice que tiene mucha demanda, y le genera muy buenas ganancias, además de que quería buscar la manera de sacar a sus hijos adelante, para darles una muy buena calidad de vida, la inversión del crédito será para la compra carnes, pollo, arroz, frijoles, refrescos, platos desechables entre otros. El sueño que tiene es que espera algún día poder cumplirlo es el de ampliar un poco mas su local y para así tenerlo muy bien surtido y proporcionarle a sus clientes comodidad.
texts.en:
The name of this group is Santiaga and its members are: Dora and Matilde.  Dora decided on this business because of the high demand and it generates good earnings, besides they also wanted to find a way to get their kids ahead and give them a better quality of life.  The loan wil be invested in the purchase of  meats, chicken, rice, beans, beverages, and disposable dishes amongst other things. 
A dream she hopes to fulfill one day is to expand her store a bit in order to keep it better stocked and offer her customers some comfort.

loans.use: to purchase: meat, chicken, rice, beans, beverages, and disposable dishes amongst other things

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
Antonio tiene 42 años, es divorciado, se encarga de la manutención de la casa y de sus tres hijos quienes asisten a diversos centros educativos.Hace más de seis años que se inicio en el ramo de venta de electrodomésticos.
Don Antonio se dedica a la venta de una gran gama de electrodomésticos en lo cual le va muy bien, pues esta situado en un muy buen lugar al costado de la ruta principal por donde el cual concurre mucha gente. Cuenta con clientela formada debido al tiempo que lleva en esto.
Se define a si mismo como una persona muy humilde y admirada por el muy buen trato que le da a sus clientes.
Solicita el credito para la compra de electrodomésticos, para que así pueda atraer a mas clientes. Tiene mucha fe en el credito porque le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Antonio is 42 years old and divorced.  He is responsible for supporting his household and his three children who are attending different schools.  More than six years ago, he started selling electrical appliances.

Antonio sells a wide range of electrical appliances and business is doing very well as it is situated in a very good location beside the main road where many people pass by.  He has regular customers owing to the length of time he has been in the business.

Antonio defines himself as a very humble person who is admired for the way he treats his customers.

Antonio is requesting a loan to buy electrical appliances, so that he can attract more customers.  He has a lot of faith in the loan because it will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: to buy electrical appliances to stock his business

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
Miguel Angel tiene 54 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con 3 hijos de 18, 13 y 11 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene  hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Miguel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz por mas de 20 años . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes .   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es comprar tierras para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta estar con la familia.
texts.en:
Miguel Angel is 54 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and three children aged 18, 13 and 11, in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Miguel is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for more than 20 years.  He buys his products in Comercial Peña and makes his sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Miguel is requesting this loan to grown corn and rice.  He will buy supplies and fertilizers.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.   His dream is to buy land so that he can continue growing his crops.

Miguel enjoys spending time with his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio, reside junto a su esposa y sus dos hijos de 7 y 4 años de edad, él es empleado de un Banco en la ciudad, actualmente tiene una dificultad con su vehículo ya que tiene desperfectos mecánicos, para solventar esta situación, Julio solicita un préstamo para la compra de repuestos y pagar el mecánico.
Esta necesidad será solventada por el préstamo, ya que él no dispone de la suficiente disponibilidad de fondos para cubrir los gastos, su objetivo es mantener en buenas condiciones su medio de transporte, para mayor seguridad y menos riesgo de accidentarse.
texts.en:
Julio lives together with his wife and his two children aged 7 and 4.  He works in a bank in the city.  Julio is currently experiencing mechanical problems with his vehicle.  In order to put this right, he is requesting a loan to buy spare parts and pay a mechanic.

Julio will cover his needs with this loan since he doesn't have enough funds available to pay for these expenses.  His goal is to keep his vehicle in good condition as this will make it safer and make him less likely to have an accident.

loans.use: to buy spare parts and pay a mechanic to fix his vehicle

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
jose Manuel tiene 23 años, Es soltero vive con los padres tiene una hija de 4 años pero no vive con el, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Jose se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como vichos en las plantas. Su sueño es tener casa propia. 

Le gusta hacer ejercicio y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
José Manuel is 23 years old.  He is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  He has a 4 year-old daughter but does not live with her.

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

José is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in Comercial Peña and makes his sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

José is requesting this loan to grown corn and rice.  He will buy supplies and fertilizers.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  He faces challenges in his business such as pests attacking his plants.  His dream is to own his own home.

José likes exercising and taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Maria Bella

texts.es:
La señora María es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 49 años de edad, es viuda y tiene cinco hijos.
Lleva tres años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de pescado, actividad que realiza en el caserío donde vive.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprará: 2 tinas de pescado pequeño, 20 kilo de boca chico, 1 juego de cuchillo, 1 piedra de afilar.
Este es un trabajo muy cansado, trabaja desde muy temprano para poder vender todo, ya que el pesacado no puede guardarse por mucho tiempo.
Está muy agradecida por los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, gracias a éstos préstamos puede seguir invirtiendo en su negocio para mejorar sus ganancias y poder solventar los gastos de casa ya que no tiene ayuda económica.
texts.en:
María is a member of the 'Manos Maravillosas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 49 years old, widowed, and has five children.

María has been working with Manuela Ramos loans for three years.  Her business is selling fish and she carries out her business in the small village in which she lives.

With this new loan for 1,700 Peruvian soles, María will buy 2 tubs of small fish, 20 kilos of bocachico (a type of fish), 1 set of knives and 1 whetstone.

María's work is very tiring.  She works from very early in the morning so that she can sell everything as the fish will not keep for long.  She is very grateful for the loans from Manuela Ramos as they mean she can continue investing in her business in order to improve her profits and cover her household expenses.  This is important as she doesn't receive any financial help.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Jose Agustin

texts.es:
Jose Agustin tiene 53 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con dos hijos de 15 y 9 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Jose se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz por mas de 25 años . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas de maiz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades.Enfrenta desafios como la sequia y plagas en los cultivo. Su sueño es compra mas terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta estar con la familia y hacer deporte.
texts.en:
José Agustín is 53 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and his two children aged 15 and 9 in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

José is a farmer who has been growing corn and rice for 25 years.  He buys his products in Comercial Peña and makes his sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

José is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice.  He will buy supplies and corn and rice seeds.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  He faces challenges in his business such as drought and pests attacking his crops.

José's dream is to buy more land so that he can continue growing his crops.

José enjoys spending time with his family and taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and corn and rice seeds

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es:
La socia es una persona responsable y trabajadora que por esas cualidades sus compañeras le invitaron a participar del banco comunal “Las Natividades” de la Asociación Arariwa.

La socia nació en la ciudad de Huarocondo de la provincia de la Convención del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 33 años de edad. Actualmente, la socia vive en la ciudad de donde nació y donde desarrolla sus actividades comerciales. Ella se dedica al engorde de ganado. Ya son 6 años que se dedican a este negocio y les va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su negocio. En esta oportunidad la socia requiere el préstamo para comprar carne de chanchos para hacer platos típicos como chicharrón para las fiestas de la Virgen del Carmen.
texts.en:
This borrower is a responsible and hard-working person and, owing to these personal qualities, her friends invited her to join Asociación Arariwa's 'Las Natividades' community bank.

The borrower was born in the city of Huarocondo, in La Convención province, in Cusco department, Peru.  She is 33 years old and currently lives in the city in which she was born.  This is where she carries out her business, fattening livestock.  She has been in this business for six years and it is doing very well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.

On this occasion, the borrower needs a loan to buy pork so that she can make traditional dishes such as 'chicharrón' (fried pork rinds) for the Virgen del Carmen fiestas.

loans.use: to buy pork

loans.name: Lira

texts.es:
La señora Lira es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 43 años de edad, está casada y tiene cinco hijos, pero solo cuatro de ellos están a su cargo.
Se dedica a la venta de golosina, utiliza un tablero para poder exhibir su mercadería. Esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulatoria junto a un grifo de la zona, donde ya tiene clientes fijos.

Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles comprará: 2 cajitas de chocolate, 2 cajas de galletas, 2, cajas de chicle, 2 bolsas de caramelo, 3 tiras de chizitos, 3 tiras de papas fritas, 3 tiras de chistriz.
Todavía tiene hijos pequeños que dependen de su trabajo y dedicación, su esposo es trabajador independiente y no cuenta con un sueldo seguro, tiene que trabajar duro para poder mantener su hogar.  Gracias a la ayuda de Lira pueden solventar los gastos de casa, él está muy contento por ello.
texts.en:
Lira is a member of the 'Manos Maravillosas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 43 years old, married and has five children, only four of whom are in her care.

Lira's business is selling candies.  She uses a board to display her merchandise.  She makes her sales as an itinerant vendor next to a local filling station where she has regular customers.

With her new loan for 1,500 Peruvian soles, Lira will buy 2 boxes of chocolate, 2 boxes of cookies, 2 boxes of gum, 2 bags of candies, 3 strips of Chizitos (a brand of cheese puffs), 3 strips of chips (crisps) and 3 strips of Chistriz.

Lira still has young children who are dependent on her work and commitment.  Her husband is self employed and doesn't have a very stable wage.  He has to work hard to support their household.  Thanks to Lira's help, they are able to cover their household expenses and this makes her husband very happy.

loans.use: to buy treats such as candies, snacks, chocolate, etc.

loans.name: Washington

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA GENERACION III”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio; el socio tiene 63 años de edad, el socio es casado, y tiene 1 hijo; el socio trabaja junto a su esposa en la atención de su restaurante, el socio se dedica  a la atención de las mesas mientras la esposa prepara las comiditas del día, ósea los menús respectivos, el socio sirve los refrescos y cobra, el hijo también los ayuda en cuanto a la cobranza y a la cocina, ellos también cuentan con un lavaplatos. El socio desea invertir el préstamo en la compra de insumos e ingredientes como arroz, papas, aceite al por mayor para el restaurante.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower is a member of the 'Nueva Generación III' community bank which is located in Huanchac district, in Cusco province, in Cusco department.

The borrower is 63 years old, married, and has one child.  He works alongside his wife, serving in their restaurant.  He waits tables while his wife prepares the meals.  The borrower serves drinks and collects payment.  Their son also helps on the till and in the kitchen.  In addition, they have a person who washes dishes.  The borrower would like to invest his loan in buying supplies and ingredients such as rice, potatoes and oil wholesale for his restaurant.

The borrower is grateful for the loan and pledges to make his repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying ingredients for his business

loans.name: Vilma Del Carmen

texts.es:
Vilma, vive con su familia, tiene dos hijos y su esposo, administra una tienda donde ofrece artículos de primera necesidad, atiende a los clientes todos los días de la semana, sus clientes son personas que viven cerca y que le conocen.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo, pues quiere instalar un cafetín en las afueras de la Iglesia, dicho préstamo será utilizado en mercadería como boquitas, galletas, dulces, bebidas y más, esta será una nueva fuente de ingreso para Vilma, que le ayudara a mejorar económicamente.
Su objetivo es crecer como comerciante, ampliándose al nuevo negocio y prestando un buen servicio que le permita mantenerse y generar los ingresos necesarios para su hogar.
texts.en:
Vilma lives with her family: her husband and two children.  She runs a store where she sells basic household products.  She serves her customers every day of the week.  Her customers are people who live nearby and know her.

Vilma is currently requesting a loan as she would like to set up a small snackbar outside the church.  This loan will be used to buy merchandise such as snacks, cookies, candies, drinks, etc.  This will be a new source of income for Vilma and will help her to improve her financial situation.

Vilma's goal is to grow as a saleswoman, expanding into her new business and providing a good service which will allow her to support herself and make the income she needs for her household.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (snacks, cookies, candies and drinks)

loans.name: Roxana Elizabeth

texts.es:
Roxana Elizabeth tiene 24 años, Es divorsiada vive con los padres y un hijo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Roxana se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y en pocas cantidades cacao . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes y para invertir en siembra de cacao.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la falta de dinero para seguir invirtiendo. Su sueño es tener un vivero de cacao y tener dienro para invertir en ello.

Le gusta hacer deporte en especial jugar boly por que es constumbre en el recinto.
texts.en:
Roxana Elizabeth is 24 years old.  She is divorced and lives with her parents and son in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Roxana is a farmer who grows corn, rice and small amounts of cacao.  She buys her products in Comercial Peña and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Roxana is requesting this loan to grow corn and rice and also to invest in her cacao crop.  She will buy supplies and fertilizers.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges in her business such as a lack of money which she needs to continue investing.  Her dream is to own a cacao nursery and have more money to invest in it.

Roxana enjoys taking part in sports, especially volleyball which is very common in her district.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for her cacao crop

loans.name: Norman Crispin

texts.en: Norman lives in Choluteca, Honduras, where he runs a small convenience shop. He has run this business out of his home for the past three years with the help of his two parents. Norman is requesting a loan of Lps. 20,000 to purchase basic grains which he will sell in his store. In his free time he enjoys playing soccer.

loans.use: to purchase rice, beans, flour, corn, and cornmeal.

loans.name: Darío De Jesús

texts.es:
Darío un luchador incansable, trabaja diariamente para hacer crecer su microempresa y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida, negocio que le ha permitido mejorar sus ingresos y aunque como él mismo lo afirma no son muchas las ganancias por lo menos tiene la tranquilidad de contar con los recursos para cubrir sus necesidades básicas. 

Poder comprar surtido para su legumbrería es una necesidad que hoy en día se le presenta, sin embargo el no cuenta con el capital para invertirlo, por lo cual solicita un préstamo que le permita comprar insumos al por mayor y generar mayores utilidades, ayudando así a mejorar las ventas y generando mas ingresos para ir poco a poco cumpliendo sus sueños.
texts.en:
Darío is a tireless fighter who works hard every day to grow his small business and improve his quality of life.  His business has enabled him to improve his income and although, as he himself admits, he doesn't make much profit, at least he knows that he has the resources he requires to cover his basic needs.

Right now, Darío needs to buy stock for his fruit and veg store.  However, he does not have the capital he needs to make this investment.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan which will allow him to buy supplies wholesale and thereby make more profits.  This will help him to improve his sales and make more income so that he can gradually achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to buy stock for his fruit and vegetable store

loans.name: Blanca Teresa

texts.es:
Blanca Teresa tiene 42 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 24, 22, y 20 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. EL PROGRESO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Aguas Frías de Mocache, perteneciente al Cantón Mocache, esta ventanilla se dedica a laborea de ciclo corto siembra de maíz y arroz

Blanca se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz . Compra sus productos en Comercial Peña y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y semillas de maiz y arroz. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la sequia y plagas en los cultivo. Su sueño es comprar un terreno y hacer la casa en la ciudad de ventanas.

Le gusta trabajar y tener dinero.
texts.en:
Blanca Teresa is 42 years old.  She is married and lives with her husband and her children aged 24, 22, and 20, in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.  

The 'El Progreso' community bank is located in Aguas Frías de Mocache, in Mocache canton.  The members of this bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Blanca is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in Comercial Peña and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Blanca is requesting this loan to sow corn and rice.  She will buy supplies, and corn and rice seeds.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She faces challenges in her business such as drought and pests attacking her crops.  Her dream is to buy a plot of land and set up home in the city of Ventanas.

Blanca enjoys working and having money.

loans.use: to buy supplies, and corn and rice seeds

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to fill payroll and to purchase kitchen equipment, baking sheets, store decorations and a neon "open" sign

loans.name: Dulce Maria

texts.es: Dulce Maria es una clienta de 36 años, vive con su hijo de 8 años hijos, en casa propia. La actividad que desarrolla es la venta de repostería la cual la realiza los días lunes a domingo en su domicilio, cuenta con clientes conocidos en su barrio. Dulce también tiene que levantarse temprano y buscar los ingredientes necesarios para la elaboración de sus productos. Invertirá en la compra de huevos, colorantes, harina, queso y leche. Este crédito le permitirá continuar desarrollando su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Dulce Maria is 36 years old and lives with her 8 year-old son in her own home.  Her business activity is selling baked pastries and desserts.  She carries out this business from Monday to Sunday in her home.  She has regular customers in her neighborhood.

Dulce has to get up early in the morning to go and find the ingredients she needs to make her products.  She will invest this loan in buying eggs, dyes, flour, cheese and milk.  This loan will enable her to continue developing her business and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy eggs, dyes, flour, cheese and milk

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy iron, paint, sandpaper and polishing disks

loans.name: Macedonio

texts.es: Macedonio tiene 45 años de edad, soltero quien vive en su casa propia en la comunidad de Puerto Mayo ubicada en las riveras del río Apurimac del distrito de Pichari. Macedonio es un hombre de buenos principios, es trabajador y sus deseos es poder vivir una vejez tranquila. Desde muy joven se dedicó a las labores del campo sobre los  terrenos que su padre le dejó como herencia y ahora es el lugar donde siembra cacao. Mas adelante espera instalar  un vivero para poder hacer injertos con las plantas de cacao, para que así pueda incrementar sus plantaciones de cacao. Es por esta razón que macedonio recurre a MFP, para solicitar un crédito con la finalidad de realizar su anhelado deseo. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con los 1.500  soles que solicita, lo invertirá en la instalación de un vivero de plantas de cacao.
texts.en:
Macedonio is 45 years old, single, and lives in his own home in Puerto Mayo community which is located on the banks of the river Apurimac, in Pichari district.

Macedonio is a man of fine principles.  He is hard working and his wish is to be able to enjoy a peaceful old age.  He has worked in agriculture, on the land that his father left him as an inheritance, since he was very young and this is where he now grows cacao.  He hopes to set up a nursery so that he can make grafts with his cacao plants.  This will enable him to increase his cacao plantings.  For this reason, Macedonio is requesting a loan from MFP so that he can achieve his goal.

This will be Macedonio's second loan from MFP and he hopes to receive the support of each and every one of you in helping him to continue in his work.  He will use the 1,500 Peruvian soles that he has requested to invest in setting up a cacao nursery.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.es:
La señora Ofelia es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 47 años de edad y dos hijos.

Lleva siete años trabajando de esta manera y Manuela Ramos ha estado brindándole los préstamos que ha requerido en cada ciclo.  Gracias a su experiencia invierte cada préstamo adecuadamente.  Empezó con un poco de mercadería y ahora ya tiene buena cantidad de cajas de bebidas surtidas.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: 17 cajas de cerveza, 6 paquetes de gaseosa, 2 paquetes de agua mineral, 2 jabas de gaseosa oro.
La venta de sus bebidas las realiza por cajas y para llevar a sus casas, de esa manera evita tener que atender hasta muy tarde, ya que el trabajo doméstico también demanda esfuerzo.
"Ofelia nos comenta que... Manuela Ramos nos brinda la ayuda necesaria para poder iniciar nuestros propios negocios y no debemos desaprovecharla".
texts.en:
Ofelia is a member of the 'Manos Maravillosas' community bank which is located in Calleria district, in Ucayali department.  She is 47 years old and has two children.

Ofelia has been working in her business for seven years and Manuela Ramos have been providing her with the loans that she has needed each loan cycle.  Thanks to her experience, she invests each loan properly.  She started out with just a little merchandise and now she has a good quantity of crates of drink in stock.

With this new loan for 3,000 Peruvian soles, Ofelia will buy 17 crates of beer, 6 packets of soda, 2 packets of mineral water and two crates of Oro soda.  She sells her drinks by the box for people to take home with them.  In this way, she avoids having to remain serving in her business until very late as her housework also requires effort.

Ofelia tells us "Manuela Ramos provide us with the help we need to start our own businesses and we must not fail to make the most of the opportunity".

loans.use: to buy drinks (soda and beer)

loans.name: Adjowa

texts.fr:
Adjowa est une femme âgée de 54 ans. Elle est veuve avec quatre enfants.
Adjowa a travaillé comme revendeuse depuis 1980. Elle vend des produits d'alimentation générale à son domicile. Une autre personne l'aide avec son travail. 
Adjowa a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter 3 cartons de boites de conserves, 3 cartons de pâtes, 3 cartons de savons et 2 paniers de poissons grillés.
texts.en:
Adjowa is a 54 years old woman. She is widowed with four children.
Adjowa has been working as a retailer since 1980. She sells grocery products from her home. Another person helps her with the work.
Adjowa requested her first loan from WAGES in order to purchase three boxes of canned food, three boxes of pasta, three boxes of soap and two baskets of grilled fish.

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Norma Piedad

texts.es:
Norma Piedad tiene 25 años, Es divorsiada vive con dos hijos de 3 y 6 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Norma se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz tradicion de su padre. Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos, fertilizantes y semillas   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. No enfrenta desafios muy importantes. Su sueño es incrementar la produccion.

Le gusta reunirse con la familia a cocinar.
texts.en:
Norma Piedad is 25 years old.  She is divorced and lives with her two children aged 3 and 6 in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'Ciudadela Los Ángeles' community bank is located in Los Ángeles, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this bank grow crops such as corn and rice.

Norma is a farmer who grows corn and rice, a tradition passed down from her father.  She buys her products in Comercial Procan and makes sells her products in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Norma is requesting this loan to grown corn and rice.  She will buy supplies, fertilizers and seeds.  The support of this loan will help her to financially cover her needs.  She does not face very important challenges in her business.  Her dream is to increase her production.

Norma enjoys getting together and cooking with her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Djarena

texts.fr: Distributrice ambulante des produits de premières nécessités (huile, tomate…) Djarena est mariée à un sous- marin et a 02 enfants. Elle  veut ce prêt pour acheter de la marchandise à Lomé. Elle a 33 ans et a démarré en 2008.
texts.en: Djarena  sells basic needs products (oil, tomatoes…) as a street vendor. She is married to a sailor and has two children. She would like to get this loan in order to stock up on merchandise in Lomé Djarena is 33 years old and launched her business in 2008.

loans.use: to buy staple foods (for resale)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy concentrated animal feed and pigs

loans.name: Pompeyo Esau

texts.es:
Pompeyo es soltero, tiene 23 años de edad, cursó los 9 años de educación primaria, se dedica a la atención de un auto hotel como receptor, y hasta el momento lleva 1 año de experiencia, actualmente vive son sus padre y recibe el apoyo de ellos.

Solicita un préstamo que le servirá para cubrir gastos personales, ya que quiere comprar una computadora que será para uso personal, ya que es muy importante para él contar con lo necesario para realizar sus tareas etc. Espera mejorar su condición de vida con este préstamo.
texts.en:
Pompeyo is single.  He is 23 years old and completed nine years at elementary school.  He works in a motel as a receptionist and has one year's experience.  He currently lives with his parents and receives support from them.

Pompeyo is requesting a loan to cover some personal expenses as he would like to buy a computer which would be for his own personal use.  It is very important for him to have what he needs to carry out his work, etc.  He hopes to improve his living conditions with this loan.

loans.use: to buy a computer

loans.name: Marjorie Noemi

texts.es:
Marjorie Noemi tiene 20 años, Es soltera vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. No tiene hijos.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Marjorie se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos, fertilizantes y semillas.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la falta de dinero para pagar a los trabajadores. Su sueño es tener dinero para salir de viaje, formar una familia y tener un buen esposo.

Le gusta bailar y ser una persona muy divertida.
texts.en:
Marjorie Noemi is 20 years old.  She is single and lives with her parents in the Ventanas Canton in los Ríos Province. She has no children.

The community bank CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES is located in the Los Angeles area, which is part of the Ventanas Canton.  The members of this community bank are engaged in work such as growing corn and rice.

Marjorie works in agriculture, growing corn and rice.  She buys supplies at Procan Commercial, and sells her products in the wholesale market of Ventanas.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies, fertilizers and seeds so she can plant corn and rice.  The support of the loan will help her financially to meet her needs. She faces challenges such as lack of money to pay her workers. Her dream is to have money to take a trip, and to create a family and have a good husband.

She likes to dance and have fun.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizers and seeds.

loans.name: Amparo Del Socorro

texts.es: Amparo soltera, sus hijos ya son mayores, trabajan por su cuenta y le ayudan. Trabaja como domestica desde hace un tiempo, trabajo humilde de mucho esfuerzo,  requiere mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda y junto a sus hijos lograra hacerlo realidad.  Con el préstamo que solicitad comprar materiales como: láminas de zinc, perlines, cemento, golosas,  para entechar la casa. Agradeciendo a la institución por el apoyo a su seguridad y comodidad de la familia.
texts.en:
Amparo is single and her children are already grown up.  They work and help her out.  Amparo has been working as a domestic employee for some time.  It is a humble job that requires a lot of effort.

Amparo needs to improve the infrastructure of her home and, together with her children, she will manage to do this.  She will use the loan that she has requested to buy materials such as: sheets of corrugated metal, beams, cement and bolts, to re-roof her home.  She is grateful to the institution for their support in improving her family's safety and comfort.

loans.use: to buy materials to replace her roof

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elisabeth is a mother of three children and they live together. She lives in the city of Hato Mayor. This is a rural area where agricultural activities are common.

She is dedicated to selling clothes. She has been running this business for around four years, and she started her business with her  first loan from Esperanza. After she joined a group and invested the loans in her business she was able to increase her sales and clients, and she started taking out individual loans to receive bigger amounts and improve her business faster.
