She will use this loan to expand her business inventory, by purchasing many different clothes, for men, women and kids. Her business profits will be used to reinvest and save, as she is looking to have higher income and be able to build a house.

She really enjoys working and serving people. She thanks you all for your support!!!

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Justino Ignacio

texts.es:
Justino Ignacio tiene 44 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con un hijo de 7 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Justino  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es comprar un carro y aumentar la produccion.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Justino Ignacio is 44 years old.  He is married and lives with his wife and 7 year-old son in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'Ciudadela Los Ángeles' community bank is located in Los Ángeles, in Ventanas canton. The members of this bank grow crops such as corn and rice.

Justino is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  He buys his products in Comercial Procan and sells his products in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Justino is requesting this loan to grown corn and rice.  He will buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops.  The support of this loan will help him to financially cover his needs.  His dream is to buy a car and increase his production.

In his spare time, Justin enjoys taking part in sports.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy material and notions such as buttons, zippers, and snap fasteners

loans.name: Leonardo Eulogio

texts.es:
Leonardo Eulogio tiene 22 años, Es soltero vive con los padres, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Leonardo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. El gran desafio es la falata de dinero para invertir. Su sueño es tener mas ingresos. 

Le gusta trabajar en el campo.
texts.en:
22-year old Leonardo Eulogio is single and lives with his parents in Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.

The V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES Bank is located in Los Ángeles Recinto, in Ventanas canton. Its members work in agriculture and grow ing such crops as corn and rice.

Leonardo too is a farmer and grows corn and rice. He buys his supplies in the Procan store and sells them in the wholesale market in Ventanas. He is seeking a loan to buy corn and rice seeds as well as supplies and fertilizer for his fields. The money will help him buy what he needs.

Leonard’s main challenge is lack of money to invest in his business. His dream is to have a greater income. He enjoys working in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizer for his fields

loans.name: Celina

texts.es:
La señora es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito Calleria, Departamento D. Ucayali, tiene 44 años D. edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.
Se dedica a la comercialización D. tabaco, lo compra en el mes D. marzo para luego preparar los cigarrillos que luego venD. al menudeo (por menor), sus clientes mayormente son los pescadores, su hijo es quien la ayuda en su puesto que tiene en un mercado D. la zona.
Con su nuevo préstamo D. S/. 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 10 mazos D. tabaco, 10 pliegos D. papel, 1 frasco D. goma.
Es un poco trabajoso elaborar estos cigarrillos pero deja sus pequeñas ganancias que sirven para poder seguir comprando  el tabaco y continuar invirtiendo en el negocio para hacerlo crecer.  Este es el negocio D. su familia D. hace mucho tiempo, gracias a Manuela Ramos sigue trabajando para poder ayudar a la economía familiar.
texts.en:
Señora Celina is a member of the Manos Maravillosas Community Bank located in Calleria district in Ucayali department. She is 44 years old, married, and has two children. 

Celina earns a living by selling tobacco which she buys in March and then makes cigarettes to sell mainly to fishermen. Her son helps her run her stall in the local market. 

With this S/. 1200 loan she will buy 10 lots of tobacco, 10 sheets of paper, and one bottle of glue. Making the cigarettes is a laborious task but it provides a small income for buying more tobacco and expanding the business. 

The business has been in the family for a long time. Celina thanks Kiva partner Manuela Ramos for helping her continue working so that she can help support her family.

loans.use: to buy tobacco

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
La señora Juana es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas, del distrito de Calleria, departamento de Ucayali, tiene 42 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene cuatro hijos.

Lleva dos años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela R., dinero que le ha servido para pagar los estudios de su hijo mayor (carrera técnica) y que ahora recibe un poco de ayuda de su parte.
Todavía tiene dos hijos pequeños que educar y tiene que seguir trabajando para que sus hijos tengan lo necesario.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 nuevos soles, mandará a reparar el motor de su motocar, ya que ha presentado fallas mecánicas y no podía trabajar adecuadamente.
"Gracias a Manuela R. he podido mantener mi negocio y dar estudios a mis hijos".
texts.en:
Juana is a member of the “Manos Maravillosas” (Marvelous Hands) Communal Bank in Calleria district, Ucayali department. She is 42 years old and a single mother with 4 children.

For 2 years she has been working with loans through Manuela R., money that has served to pay for her eldest son's studies for a technical career. He still receives some help from her, and Juana has 2 other small children to educate. She has to continue working so that her children will have what they need.

With this new loan of 1,500 new sols, Juana will have the motor of her motorcycle-taxi repaired, since it doesn't work adequately and has shown signs of mechanical failure.

Juana says “Thanks to Manuela R. I have been able to maintain my business and offer my children education.”

loans.use: to rebuild the engine on her motorcycle-taxi.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: La señora Maria Elena se dedica a la elaboración de de dulces. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de azúcar, envases, leche, queso, mantequilla, coco y pollo. Es la fuente de ingresos que tiene para cubrir sus gastos. Vive en el reparto candelaria, pero Maria tiene que salir todos los días de manera ambulantes para ofrecer sus dulces.  Tiene dos hijos que son mayores de edad y trabajan de manera independiente. Maria se encuentra muy satisfecha con los créditos que obtuvo anteriormente ya que pudo mejorar la producción de sus productos.
texts.en: María Elena makes sweets.  She needs the loan to buy sugar, containers, milk, cheese, butter, coconut and chicken.  This is her source of income to pay expenses.  She lives in Candelaria but María has to go out daily to sell her sweets.  She has two adult children who work independently.  María is very satisfied with the loans she obtained previously because she was able to improve production of her products.

loans.use: to buy sugar, containers, milk, cheese, butter, coconut and chicken.

loans.name: Martha Mercedes

texts.es:
Martha Mercedes tiene 43 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con un hijo, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Martha se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener mas ingresos para darle al hijo todo lo necesario.

Le gusta estar con la familia.
texts.en:
Martha Mercedes is 43 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and one child in the Ventanas Canton in los Ríos Province.

The community bank CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES is located in the Los Angeles area, which is part of the Ventanas Canton. The members of this community bank are engaged in work such as growing corn and rice.

Martha works in agriculture, growing corn and rice. She buys supplies at Procan Commercial, and sells her products in the wholesale market of Ventanas.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for the crops so she can plant corn and rice. The support of the loan will help her financially to meet her needs.  Her dream is to have greater earnings so as to be able to provide everything necessary for her child.

She likes to spend time with her family.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Ulda Ruth

texts.es:
La señora Ulda es socia del banco comunal Miraflores del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 49 años de edad, es viuda y tiene dos hijos.
Lleva más de 12 años trabajando con los préstamo de Manuela Ramos se dedica al servicio de alquiler de habitaciones, tiene cuartos pequeños en alquiler por los cuales cobra mensualmente.
Con este nuevo prétamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles comprará: un ciento de madera machimbrada, 2 kilos de clavo, 1 ventana de madera, 4 bisagras, 1 chapa para puerta.
Con éste crédito podrá construir un cuarto más, el mismo que también dará en alquiler.  Su casa queda en el centro de la ciudad.  Este negocio le permite generar los ingresos que necesita para poder mantener a sus hijos y darle lo necesario para que puedan estudiar.
Gracias a Manuela Ramos ha podido sacar adelante a sus hijos porque tenía la idea pero no contaba con el dinero.  Está muy agradecida por todo lo que hasta este momento ha construido para mejorar la vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Ulda is a member of the Miraflores community bank in the Yarinacocha District in the Department of Ucayali.  She is 49 years old, and is a widow with two children.

She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for more than 12 years.  Her business is a service that rents rooms; she has small rooms for rent for which she charges monthly.

With this new loan of 1000 New Soles, she will buy: a hundred tongue-and-groove wooden planks, 2 kilos of nails, 1 wooden window, 4 hinges, and 1 door.

With this loan she will be able to build another room which she will be able to offer for rent.  Her house is in the center of the city. This business allows her to generate the income needed to provide for her children and give them what they need to be able to study.

Thanks to Manuela Ramos she has been able to help her children move forward in life, as she had an idea but had no money.  She is very grateful for everything that she has built to this point to improve her family's life.

loans.use: to buy hinges, wood, nails and other items.

loans.name: Hugo Antonio

texts.es:
Hugo Antonio tiene 46 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y un hijo de 17 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Hugo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la falta de dinero para pagar a los trabajadores. Su sueño es comprar mas terreno para seguir sembrando.

Le gusta hacer deporte con el hijo.
texts.en:
Hugo Antonio is 46 years old, married, and lives with his wife and a son aged 17 in Ventanas canton, De los Rios province.

The members of the “Ciudadela Los Angeles” (Fortress of the Angels) communal bank are located in the Los Angeles neighborhood of Ventanas canton. The bank's members are dedicated to work such as sowing corn and rice.

Hugo too is a farmer who sows corn and rice. He buys supplies and fertilizers for his crops from Comercial Procan and sells his harvests in the wholesale market in Ventanas. 

Hugo is requesting a loan to sow corn and rice and buy supplies and fertilizers for his crops. This loan will help him economically by supplying his necessities. He faces challenges such as the lack of money to pay his laborers.

Hugo's dream is to buy more land and to continue sowing. He likes to play sports with his son.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for his corn and rice crops.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Rosario es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Emprendedoras del Distrito de Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 48 años y 6 hijos.
Sus préstamos íntegramente los invierte en la compra de materiales seguir mejorando la infraestructura de su casa, la misma que ofrece servicio de hospedaje, Rosario alquila habitaciones personales y por ello necesita dar mantenimiento a su casa constantemente y poder brindar todas las comodidades a sus huéspedes.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 2,000.00 nuevos comprará: 3 metro de arena para enlucir dos cuartos, 6 baldes de pintura,  2 ventanas de aluminio.
Todos sus préstamos los ha sabido invertir en su negocio, gracias a las ganancias puede solventar los gastos de cas y pagar las cuotas mensuales a Manuela Ramos. 
"Gracias a Manuela Ramos por darme tanta facilidad para los préstamos que solicito todos los ciclos.
texts.en:
Rosario is a member of the “Mujeres Emprendedoras” (Enterprising Women) Communal Bank in Yarinacocha district, Ucayali department. She is 48 years old and has 6 children.

Rosario's loans were invested entirely in buying materials to continue improving the infrastructure of her house, which offers hospitality services. Rosario rents out personal rooms and for that reason, she constantly needs to maintain her house and offer all the conveniences to her guests.

With this new loan of 2,000 new sols, Rosario will buy 3 meters of sand to plaster 2 rooms, 6 buckets of paint, and 2 aluminum windows.

All Rosario's loans have been invested in her business, and thanks to her earnings, she can cover household costs and make her monthly payments to Manuela Ramos.

Rosario says “Thanks to Manuela Ramos for facilitating the loans I requested during all the loan cycles.”

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, and windows for her house.

loans.name: Rudy Ivonne

texts.es:
Rudy Ivonne tiene 27 años, Es soltera vive con los padres, no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Rudy se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es tener estabilidad economica.

Le gusta bailar y ser una persona responsable.
texts.en:
Rudy Ivonne is 27 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in the Ventanas Canton in los Ríos Province. She has no children.

The community bank CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES is located in the Los Angeles area, which is part of the Ventanas Canton. The members of this community bank are engaged in work such as growing corn and rice.

Rudy works in agriculture, growing corn and rice. She buys supplies at Procan Commercial, and sells her products in the wholesale market of Ventanas.

She is requesting the loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops. The support of the loan will help her financially to meet her needs. Her dream is to have financial stability.

She likes to dance and to be a responsible person.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers for her crops.

loans.name: Nicolaza

texts.es: Nicolaza tiene 47 años de edad, es viuda pero vive en compañía de sus 5 hijos en su casa propia ubicada en la comunidad de puerto mayo que pertenece al distrito de Pichari. Nicolaza nos menciona que para haber conseguido todo lo que tiene fue gracias al sacrificio y a la perseverancia, para ello se tuvo que privar de muchas cosas propias de un joven. Toda su vida se ha dedicado al negocio y ahora se dedica en la venta de calzados, por tanto espera tener una tienda, pues ha visto que no hay negocio de este rubro dentro de su comunidad además tiene mayor demanda de sus clientes. Ella cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos, ya que ellos se encargan de atender a los clientes, además que la variedad de calzados que vende son a precios muy cómodos; de esta manera los pobladores de puerto mayo siempre acuden al pequeño establecimiento de Nicolaza. Este será su segundo crédito con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para concretar con sus objetivos. Asegura  sentirse cómoda con su banco comunal, ya que todos se solidarizan entre sí. Con los 1.500 Nicolaza comprará más productos de primera necesidad para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Nicolaza is 47 years old.  She is a widow but lives with her ​​five children in her own home, which is located in the Puerto Mayo community which is in Pichari district. 

Nicolaza mentions to us that she has been able achieve everything she has thanks to sacrifice and perseverance, for she has had to deprive herself of many things ever since she was young.  Her whole life has been devoted to business and now she works selling shoes. She therefore hopes to have a store, as she has seen there isn't a business of this type within their community.  In addition, she has increased demand from her customers. She has the help of her children, who are responsible for serving customers.  Also, the variety of shoes that she sells are at very affordable prices, so the people of Puerto Mayo always go to Nicolaza's small establishment. 

This will be her second loan through MFP, therefore she hopes for support from each of you in achieving her goals.  She assures us that she feels comfortable with her community bank, since they are all supporting each other. 

With the 1,500 New Soles Nicolaza will buy more product staples to stock up her business.

loans.use: to stock up on more shoes.

loans.name: Carmen Elia

texts.es:
La señora Carmen es socia del banco comunal Miraflores del Distrito de Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 35 años de edad, está casada y tiene tres hijos.
Desde hace tres ciclos que recién está integrando este banquito comunal, Carmen se dedica, como muchas mujeres de la zona, a la venta de productos de belleza por catálogo.  Ya cuanta con un buen capital porque sus pedidos los envía a un caserío que se encuentra por el rio Ucayali, donde su clientela es fija y cumplida.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,000.00 nuevos soles, comprará productos para su stock, comprará: 3 cremas para manos, 3 champú,  3 labiales, 2 cuartetos de sombras,3 colonias, 3 jaboncillos, 1 crema para el acné, 1 bloqueador solar, 2 perfumes, 1 colonia para después del baño.  
Su negocio lo inició como jugando y ahora tiene  que dedicarle tiempo completo, porque tiene que salir a recoger los pedidos, distribuirlos y también cobrar a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mrs. Carmen is a member of the communal bank "Miraflores" in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali.  She is 35, married and has three children.

Carmen joined the communal bank three terms ago and, like many women in the area, sells beauty products by catalogue.  She has been able to earn considerable money because she sends her orders to a rural area near the Ucayali River where she has fixed, well-paying customers.

With the new loan in the amount of 1,000 PEN she will buy more inventory.  She plans to buy 3 handcreams, 3 shampoos, 3 lipsticks, 2 eyeshadow quartets, 3 colognes, 3 soaps, 1 acne cream, 1 sunscreen, 2 perfumes, and one after-bath cologne.

She began the business as a hobby but now must dedicate her full time to it because she has to pick up orders and distribute them, as well as collect from her customers.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics: lipstick, eyeshadow, sunscreen, perfumes, etc.

loans.name: Miguel Hernan

texts.es:
Miguel Herman tiene 35 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos , en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto los Ángeles, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Miguel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Su sueño es aumentar la produccion.

Le gusta hacer deporte con la familia.
texts.en:
Miguel Herman is 35, married and lives with his wife and children in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank CIUDADELA LOS ANGELES is located in the community of Los Ángeles, which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  This group is involved in agriculture, mainly growing corn and rice.

Miguel grows corn and rice, buying his supplies in Comercial Procan and selling his produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer so he can begin planting.  With the help of the loan he will be able to buy what he needs.  His dream is to increase production.

He enjoys taking part in sports with his family.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer for his crops.

loans.name: Justo Silvino

texts.es:
El Señor Juan, de 44 años de edad, es casado, con la señora Carmen, tienen 5 hijos.
El es panadero, aprendió dicho oficio de sus padres, ya que desde muy pequeño trabajo con ellos en esa profes ion. Empezó con la ayuda de su padre, luego al casarse con la ayuda de su compañera, y gracias a su esfuerzo diario logra captar y atraer clientelas en distinto puntos de la ciudad el cual recorre en su motocicleta mediante su buen trato y precio accesible de sus panificados.
El Sr. Juan solicita el credito para la compra de bolsas de harina y demás insumos que va a necesitar para la elaboración de sus panes. El cree que el credito le sera de mucha ayuda puesto que por medio de este podrá asegurar la materia prima para la elaboración de sus panes.
texts.en:
Mr. Juan, 44, is married to Carmen and they have five children.  He earns a living as a baker and learned his trade from his parents.  He worked with them in the profession since he was very young.  With the help of his parents he set up his own business and, after marrying, had the help of his wife.  Thanks to their efforts they have been able to attract customers from different parts of the city because of his kindness and low prices.  He uses his motorcycle to deliver goods to customers.

Juan is requesting a loan to buy bags of flour and other supplies that he needs to make bread.  He believes the loan will be of great help since it will ensure he has the raw material he needs for his business.

loans.use: To buy bags of flour and other supplies.

loans.name: Dony

texts.es:
Dony es un hombre de empuje, muy trabajador y solidario.
El está solicitando un préstamo por el monto de  ₡400.000 (cuatrocientos mil colones), esto sería para la compra de una computadora portátil e impresora multifuncional, para llevar más fácil y ordenada las finanzas.
El desea mejor su calidad de vida, salir adelante con la empresa y lograr crecer e incrementar las ganancias, ya que pertenece a la Empresa de Crédito Comunal de Nimboyore, en Guanacaste, una de las 110 empresas que existen en el país.
texts.en:
Dony is a hard worker and very supportive.  He is requesting a loan in the amount of 400,000 CRC to buy a laptop computer and multi-function printer so he can handle the finances more easily.

He wants to improve his lifestyle and help his company get ahead by growing business and increasing earnings.  He belongs to the Communal Credit Company of Nimboyore in Guanacaste, one of 110 companies that exist in the country.

loans.use: To buy computer equipment.

loans.name: Lastenia

texts.es:
La señora Lastenia es socia del banco comunal Manos Maravillosas del Distrito De Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 47 años de edad y dos hijos.
Son seis años que viene trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, tiene u su cargo una empresa de transportes que hace traslados a un caserío cercano.  Su trabajo comienza a primeras horas de la mañana, despacha los carros a horas indicadas, ella se encarga de su administración y programación de las unidades.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 3,000.00 nuevos soles comprarán: repuestos para el motor de uno de sus carros, 2 llantas, 1 batería, 1 estintor, 1 botiquín y el pago al mecánico por su servicio.
Todos los días es la misma rutina que sigue y lo hace con mucho esmero porque el negocio es de su propiedad y vale la pena dedicarle todo el tiempo que sea necesario ya que los ingresos permiten cubrir los gastos de estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Lastenia is a member of the communal bank Manos Maravillosas in the district of Calleria, department of Ucayali.  She is 47 and has two children.  For six years she has been working with Manuela Ramos.  She owns a transportation company that covers the route to a nearby rural community.  Her work starts early in the morning when she dispatches the vehicles at specific times.  She handles administration and transport schedules.

With the loan in the amount of 3,000 PEN she plans to buy motor parts for one of her two vehicles, 2 tires, 1 battery, 1 extinguisher, 1 first aid kit and pay for the mechanic's services.

Every day she has the same routine, which she handles very efficiently because the business is worth dedicating as much time to it as necessary, since the income is used to cover her children's education costs.

loans.use: To buy auto repair parts.

loans.name: Jeny Perlita

texts.es:
La  señora Jeny es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Emprendedoras del Distrito Calleria, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 44 años de edad, está casada y tiene dos hijos.
Recién lleva 3 ciclos trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica al servicio de alquiler de Habitaciones (cuartos), tiene en su casa más de 20 cuartos los cuales alquila a personas muy responsables que le cumplen puntualmente con sus pagos.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,200.00 nuevos soles comprará: 10 planchas de triplay, 15 tapajuntas, 2 kilos de clavos de una pulgada, y cubrirá el servicio de mano de obra del carpintero que realizará trabajos en su casa para dar mantenimiento a las habitaciones.
Gracias a este negocio puede ayudar a su esposo.  La inversión que hizo para construir todos estos cuartos, le permitirá asegurar el futuro de sus hijos, quienes podrán estudiar sin ningún inconveniente.
Agradece a Manuela Ramos por los préstamos otorgados a su persona.
texts.en:
Jeny is a member of the Mujeres Emprendedoras ("Entrepreneurial Women") communal bank of the Calleria District, in the Department of Ucayali. She is 44 years old and married with two children.

Recently, she has participated in 3 loan cycles with the Manuela Ramos organization. Her work is renting rooms. In her home, she has more than 20 rooms, which she rents to very responsible people who make their payments punctually. 

With her new loan for 1,200.00 Peruvian new soles, she will buy 10 sheets of plywood, 15 pieces of flashing, and 2 kilos of 1-inch nails, and she will also pay for the services of the carpenter who will carry out maintenance on the rooms in her house. 

Thanks to this business, she is able to help out her husband. The investment which she made to build all of these rooms will allow her to provide a secure future to her children, who will be able to study without any hindrances. 

She is grateful to the Manuela Ramos organization for the loans granted to her as an individual.

loans.use: to buy plywood and other construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medications.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Inna

texts.ru:
Инна замужем. У нее есть взрослый сын Владимир. Муж Инны занимается грузоперевозками на собственном грузовике. Сын работает в автосервисе. Инна – предприниматель из Мелитополя. Она торгует чулочными и носочными изделиями на центральном рынке своего города. У нее всегда приемлемые цены. Инна имеет огромный опыт работы в торговле – она работает на рынке уже 16 лет. На данный момент размер ее оборотных средств составляет 22,000 гривен. А ее прибыль составляет 8,000 гривен в месяц. 

Инна – трудолюбивый, ответственный и старательный предприниматель. На данный момент Инне необходима сумма в 15,000 гривен для того, чтобы увеличить ассортимент товара и получить дополнительную прибыль. Она надеется, что сможет развивать бизнес и постепенно улучшать благосостояние своей семьи. За счет получения дополнительной прибыли клиент планирует отдых своей семьи на море. 

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Inna is married. She has a grown son named Vladimir. Inna's husband transports freights on his own autotruck. Her son works in the auto service. Inna is an entrepreneur from Melitopol. She sells stockings and socks on the central marker of her town. She always has reasonable prices. Inna has a rich experience working in retail - she has been working on the market for sixteen years. At this time her working capital totals to 22,000 hrivnas. And her profit totals to 8,000 hrivnas a month.

Inna is a hardworking, responsible and diligent businesswoman. At this time Inna needs an amount of 15,000 hrivnas to increase the variety of her merchandise and take out an additional profit. She hopes that she can grow her business and gradually increase the well being of her family. By getting additional profit she plans to take her family to the sea on vacation.

loans.use: to buy an additional batch of new merchandise

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El comité Mujeres unidas es de la ciudad de San Lorenzo. Una de las miembros oyó hablar del proyecto de mujeres emprendedoras y decidió formar a sus amigas y vecinas para la formación del grupo. Ellas son unas mujeres trabajadoras que piensan en salir adelante y darle a sus hijos lo necesario para una vida digna y decorosa.
Ellas se definen como mujeres trabajadoras que luchan día a día por llevar un mayor ingreso económico para sus casas.
La Sra. Jorgelina tiene una despensa, por medio de la cual puede sustentar a su familia. Desde hace ya unos años que ella se dedica a esto, por lo que ya tiene una clientela bien formada.
Ella solicita el credito para el abastecimiento de su negocio, con productos tales como comestibles, lácteos, embutidos, bebidas y demás. Tiene las esperanzas puestas en el préstamo ya que sabe que le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Unidas” (United Women) Communal Bank is in the city of San Lorenzo.  One of the members heard talk about the project for enterprising women.  She decided to get her friends and neighbors together in order to form the group.

They are hard-working women who plan to get ahead and to give their children what they need for a decent and respectable life.  They are known as hard-working women who struggle day to day to bring home more income.

Jorgelina has a general store.  It is through the store the she is able to support her family.  She has been doing this for some time.  Therefore, she has regular customers.

She is requesting the loan to stock her business with grocery products like dairy products, sausages, drinks, and more.  Her hopes are placed on the loan because she knows that it will be a big help.

loans.use: to buy grocery products like dairy products, sausages, drinks, and more.

loans.name: Leonardo José

texts.es:
Leonardo, un joven de 30 años, se casó a muy corta edad teniendo tan solo 17 años, lo cual dentro de su matrimonio procreo dos hijos. De profesión Agricultor, inicia hace 10 años, originario de La Quinta - Isiqui/ Estelí. Pudo impulsar su producción y conocimientos adquiridos con la ayuda de su padre. 

Solicitó el financiamiento del crédito para la siembra de frijoles, compra de insumos y pago de mano de obra. En un futuro desea comprar su propia tierra para seguir cultivando frijoles y obtener un buen capital de trabajo para estar limpio y no tener deudas pendientes.
texts.en:
Leonardo is a young man of 30.  He got married at a very young age (when he was only 17) and has two children from his marriage.  Leonardo is a farmer by profession.  He started out 10 years ago and is originally from La Quinta - Isiqui/Estelí.  He has been able to boost his production and knowledge with the help of his father.

Leonardo requested this loan to grow beans, buy supplies and pay workers.  In the future he would like to buy his own land where he will continue growing beans.  He would also like to have good working capital so that he can be free of debts.

loans.use: to maintain two 'manzanas' (approx. 3.4 acres) of beans.

loans.name: Nicolasa Candelaria

texts.es:
La señora Nicolasa Candelaria es casada, tiene 19 años de edad, curso los 5 años de educación primaria, se dedica a la venta de comida en ferias, inicio este trabajo por iniciativa propia y deseos de superación y hasta el momento lleva 3 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al comercio ambulante.

Decide solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de insumos y artículos para el negocio que tiene de la venta de comida y bebidas, va a comprar frutas, verduras, condimentos, azúcar, lecha, etc. En el futuro quiere ver su negocio con mayor productividad y ofreciendo un servicio de mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Señora Nicolasa Candelaria is married and is 19 years old. She completed five years of primary education and makes a living selling food at fairs. She began this work on her own initiative and her desire to get ahead. She now has three years of experience and she has the support of her husband who earns his living as a street vendor.

She has decided to request a loan that will allow her to purchase supplies and items for her business selling food and drinks. She will buy fruit, vegetables, condiments, sugar, milk, etc. In the future she wants to see her business be more productive and offer a better quality service.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for food preparation.

loans.name: Nubes Group

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Monterrey Nuevo León, se integro un grupo solidario de 6 mujeres con el nombre Nubes. Ellas escogieron ese nombre porque cada una de sus integrantes tienen muchos planes que se expanden mas allá de los horizontes y tan alto como las “Nubes”.

Una de las integrantes es Hortencia, mujer de 57 años que se dedica a la venta de ropa en un mercado donde con las ganancias sobrevive diariamente y le da para alimentar a sus dos hijos; actualmente vende ropa, zapatos y aparatos electrónicos usados (teléfonos, estereos, televisiones, etc). Día con día se esfuerza y busca diferentes recursos para superarse. Con su crédito Hortensia piensa comprar más mercancía (ropa y electrónicos) para incrementar sus ventas.A largo plazo, ella quiere comprarse una camioneta con la cual pueda transportar su mercancía y así ahorrar más tiempo, el cual puede invertir en las ventas de la misma; siendo este el primer paso de un negocio más grande.
texts.en:
A group of six, mutually supportive women came together in the city of Monterrey, Nuevo León.  It’s called “Nubes” (Clouds).  They chose that name because each of the group members has many plans that expand beyond the horizon and soar as high as the “clouds.”

Hortensia, 57, is one of the members.  She sells clothes in a market and uses the profits for daily survival and to feed her two children.  She currently sells clothes, shoes and used electronic devices (telephones, stereos, television sets, etc.)  Every day she struggles and strives to find different resources to get ahead.

Hortensia will use her loan to buy more merchandise (clothes and electronics) to increase her sales.  In the long run, she wants to buy a pick-up truck to transport her merchandise and save time and invest it in her business; this would be the first step toward a bigger business.

loans.use: to buy more clothes.

loans.name: Vasiliy

texts.ru:
Василий женат, у него 11-летняя дочь и годовалый сын. Василий живет и работает в Ивано-Франковске. Он занимается пассажирскими перевозками по Украине. Василий – бывший военный. После сокращения военного штата Василий начал работать в такси. Он предоставляет свои услуги уже на протяжении 12 лет. Его ежемесячный доход составляет 5,000 гривен.  

Этот бизнес – основной источник дохода для семьи заемщика. Василий собирается использовать 11,000 гривен на капитальный ремонт кузова авто и полную его покраску. Это поможет подготовить его автомобиль к дальнейшей работе на длительный период времени. Более того, Василий надеется обустроить квартиру, в которой живет вместе с семьей. Совсем недавно у него родился второй ребенок.  

Пометка: история на РУССКОМ языке
texts.en:
Vasiliy is married, he has an eleven year old daughter and a son who is one years old. Vasiliy lives and works in Ivano-Frankivsk. He does passenger transportation around Ukraine. Vasiliy served in the military. After the downsizing of the military state Vasily began to work as a taxi driver. He provides his services for twelve years now. His monthly income is 5,000 hrivnas.

This business is a main source of income for the borrower's family. Vasily plans to use 11,000 hrivnas to do a complete repair of the vehicle's body and a new paint job. This will help to prepare his car for longer service for a longer period of time. Moreover, Vasily hopes to upgrade his apartment where he lives with his family. Just recently his second child was born.

loans.use: to make a complete body renovation and paint job for the vehicle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Socorro Del Carmen

texts.es:
A unos 6 Km de la ciudad de Estelí, se encuentra una comunidad llamada Isiqui, donde habita Socorro, una mujer de 31 años de edad, agricultora y ama de casa, casada con el señor Juan Ramón, con el cual proceraron dos hijos de 12 y 04 años de edad respectivamente. La señora Socorro nos cuenta que debido a la situación económica no pudo terminar sus estudios por lo que con dificultad llegó a tercer grado de primaria donde aprendió a escribir y leer. Dedicada a la agricultura desde hace 10 años, exactamente a la siembra de frijoles y maiz, es ella quien gestiona los préstamos y su esposo trabaja la tierra. Este crédito lo solicitó para la compra de insumos y pago de mano de obra. Nos dice que está segura que el préstamo le ayudará a solventar necesidades que presenta ahora y hará crecer su producción. 
Dentro de sus planes futuros está aumentar las áreas de siembra de maiz y frijoles la cual le genere mejores ingresos y asi poder mejorar su vivienda
texts.en:
Socorro lives in a town called Isiqui, which is located some 6km from the city of Estelí.  She is 31 years old, a farmer and housewife, and is married to Juan Ramón. They have two children, 12 and 4 years old. Socorro tells us that due to the financial situation she wasn't able to complete her studies, and barely reached the third grade of primary school, where she learned to read and write.  

She has farmed for the last 10 years, planting beans and corn specifically.  She's the one who manages the loans, while her husband works the land.  She applied for this loan in order to buy agricultural inputs, and to pay for labor. She tells us she's sure that the loan will help her pay for what she needs needs and increase her production.  In the future she plans to expand the areas sown in corn and beans, which will generate better income for her and enable her to improve her home.

loans.use: To buy agricultural inputs for corn and beans

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy baskets for re-sale.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.es: El sr. Reynaldo, es un cliente nuevo, con buena referencia crediticia, se dedica a la confección de pantalones y a la vez a su venta, su puesto es puesto fijo en una de las calle comerciales de la ciudad de La paz, por lo que se pudo evidenciar el cliente en el momento de la evaluación, fue muy atento y además cordial, El sr. Reynaldo vive en la zona Alto Chijini, también  el sr. Reynaldo lleva a vender su mercadería al interior a las ciudades de Oruro y Cochabamba y a la feria 16 de julio, es un cliente trabajador y muy dinámico, que tiene mucho entusiasmo en cuanto a su trabajo, para así con el  tiempo, comprarse una casa que este en una avenida o en una calle comercial, con el dinero del crédito comprara variedad de telas para surtir su sastrería, es una persona trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Reynaldo is a new client with good credit references.  He makes pants to sell.  His stand is a fixed stand on one of La Paz’s commercial streets so we were able to verify his situation at the moment the evaluation took place; he was very attentive and also courteous.

Reynaldo lives in the Alto Chijini zone.  He also takes his merchandise to cities in the interior, like Oruro and Cochabamba, to sell and also sells at the 16 de Julio market.  

He is a hardworking, dynamic client who is very enthusiastic about his work hoping in time to be able to buy a house located on a commercial avenue or street.  He will use the money from the loan to buy an assortment of fabric to stock his tailor shop.  He is a hard working person who is grateful to the institution for the support provided.

loans.use: to stock up on fabric.

loans.name: San Gregorio Group

texts.es:
El comité San Gregorio es de la zona de San Lorenzo. Actualmente este comité esta integrado por 17 mujeres, todas ellas son muy trabajadoras y sacrificadas.
Ellas manifiestan que todo el esfuerzo que hacen es para brindarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos y demás familiares que de ellas dependen. Desean que sus hijos no pasen las mismas privaciones que ellas tuvieron que pasar.
La Sra. Silvia se dedica a la venta de ropas desde hace ya varios años. Tiene muchos clientes que le demandan cada vez mas variedades de ropas. A ella le gustaría algún día poder tener su propio negocio donde vender sus prendas.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de mas variedades de ropas de temporada, con lo cual podrá satisfacer la demanda que tiene.
texts.en:
The San Gregorio committee is in the area of San Lorenzo. Currently this committee is made up of 17 women, all of them very hard working and selfless.  

They express that all of their efforts are to provide a better future for their children and other family members that depend on them. They hope that their children do not experience the same hardships they have had to experience.

Señora Silvia has earned a living selling clothes for several years now. She has many customers who continually ask for a greater variety of clothing. One day she would like be able to have her own business selling her garments. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase a greater variety of seasonal clothing with which she will be able to satisfy the demand she has.

loans.use: to by seasonal clothing.

loans.name: Filemon

texts.es: Filemón, un señor muy humilde de 45 años de edad, originario de la zona de Isiqui - Estelí, casado con  dos hijos los cuales  crio desde muy pequeños como hijos propios, a los cuales le ha enseñado el amor y cultivo a las tierras, haciendolos hombres de bien . Inicio sus actividades en la agricultura a la edad de 15 años, con ayuda de su amigo Ramón Diaz ya que no pudo contar con su padre, quien lo abandonó a muy pronta edad. El señor Filemón solicitó su crédito para la compra de insumos que le hacian falta para la siembra de maiz y frijoles. Él espera llegar a terminar su cosecha y no perderla, para asi poder ampliar su cosecha en un futuro no muy lejano y realizar mejora a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Filemón is a very humble 45 year-old man from Isiqui-Estelí.  He is married and has two children who he raised from a very young age as his own.  He has taught them how to love and cultivate the land and has made good men out of them.  Filemón started working in farming when he was 15 years old with the help of his friend Ramón Diaz.  He couldn't rely on his father as he abandoned him at a very young age.

Filemón requested this loan to buy supplies that he needs to grow his corn and beans.  He hopes to have a successful harvest, and not lose it, so that he can expand his plantings in the not-so-distant future and make improvements to his home.

loans.use: to buy supplies for growing beans and corn

loans.name: Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
El comité surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la fundación, el grupo se encuentra en el 10º ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2008. Actualmente cuenta con 17 miembros, las cuales trabajan de forma responsable y coordinada
La Sra. Silvina tiene 3 hijos pequeños, es casada y se dedica hace varios años a la venta comestibles en forma ambulante, por su barrio y también por el centro de la ciudad. Ella por medio de este trabajo ha logrado mantener a sus hijos y sacarlos adelante. Ella quiere brindarles aquella educación a la cual ella no pudo tener acceso.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de los ingredientes para la elaboración de los alimentos, como ser las carnes, especias, huevos, jamón, queso y demás. Ella sabe que el credito le sera de mucha ayuda, pues le servirá para tener bien surtidos sus ingredientes.
texts.en:
This communal bank emerged from contact with one of the members of the Fundación.  The group is in its tenth cycle, and it has been working with the Fundación since 2008.  The group currently has 17 member, and they work in a responsible and coordinated way.

Silvina is married and has three small children.  She has been selling food in an itinerant manner for several years.  She sells in her neighborhood and also in the center of the city.  It is through this work that she has managed to support her children and to get them ahead.  She wants to give them the education that she was not able to have.

She is requesting the loan to buy ingredients to make food.  She will buy things like meat, spices, eggs, ham, cheese, and other ingredients.  She knows that the loan will be a big help.  It will help her to be well-stocked with ingredients.

loans.use: to buy meat, spices, eggs, ham, cheese, and other ingredients.

loans.name: Alba Elizabeth

texts.es:
Alba, vive con su familia, tiene dos hijos de 14 y 8 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, las prepara en su casa y sale a ofrecerlas casa por casa, este negocio le ayuda a mantenerse y poder contar con lo necesario para subsistir.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar maíz y gas, pues son sus principales materiales para ejecutar el trabajo, con esta compra estará mejorando su servicio y producción para los clientes.
Su objetivo es mejorar las ventas, proveer para sus hijos lo necesario y en un futuro contar con su propia vivienda, ya que actualmente alquilan.
texts.en:
Alba lives with her family; she has two children who are 14 and 8 years of age.  She sells home-made tortillas that she goes out to sell door to door.  This business helps to support herself and to have what’s necessary to survive.

She is asking for a loan to buy corn and gas because they are the main supplies she needs to do her work.  With this purchase she will be improving service and production for her customers.  Her goal is to improve sales, provide what’s necessary for her children and, in the future, have her own house since she currently rents.

loans.use: to buy corn and gas to make tortillas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fruit like papaya, watermelon, cucumber, mango and pineapple.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn to make tortillas.

loans.name: Rosibel

texts.es:
Rosibel, se dedica al procesamiento de productos lácteos,  tiene 35 años de edad, es madre soltera de una niña de 15 años, su apoyo solamente son sus abuelos, Rosibel inicio el negocio por la necesidad de tener ingresos para el hogar, por las mañanas sale a vender de forma ambulante y por las tardes prepara los productos para el próximo día.
Ella necesita un préstamo para comprar leche y aumentar la producción de cuajada, además quiere invertir en cerdos de engorde, esto será una gran ayuda para el negocio, ya que aumentara su producción y también atenderá un nuevo sector como comercializar los cerdos.
Espera mejorar su situación económica, ayudar a su hija en el estudio, poco a poco mejorar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Rosibel makes dairy products.  She’s 35 years old and a single mother of a 15-year-old girl.  Her only support is her grandparents.  Rosibel started the business because she needed to produce income for the home.  She goes out mornings to sell and spends afternoons making the next day’s products.

She needs a loan to buy milk to increase cheese production.  She also wants to buy piglets to raise.  This will be of great help for her business because she’ll increase production and she’ll also have a new sector: selling pigs.

She hopes to improve her economic situation, to help with her daughter’s education and gradually improve the conditions of her dwelling.

loans.use: to buy milk.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras Iii Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras III viene trabajando desde el año 2009, y se han fortalecido mucho como comité, creciendo y avanzando para poder obtener su fin propuesto.
Las integrantes son muy trabajadoras y a la hora de cumplir con sus obligaciones se definen como mujeres muy responsables. Ellas se unieron con el fin de llevar mas ingresos a sus casas y por medio de esto poder brindarles a sus hijos una vida digna y decorosa.
La Sra. Ignacia se dedica a la venta de ropas desde hace ya varios años, por esta razón tiene ya una clientela bien definida. Ella tiene muchas demandas de abrigos y demás por la temporada que entra.
Ella solicita el credito para la compra de mas prendas para el abastecimiento de sus productos de ventas, como ser camperas, buzos, gorras y demás. Tiene fe en que el credito le sera de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The “Mujeres Emprendedoras III” (Enterprising Women III) Communal Bank started in 2009.  They have become much stronger as a communal bank.  They have been growing and advancing in order to be able to achieve their end purpose.

The members are very hard-workers.  When the time comes to meet their obligations, they are known as very responsible women.  They got together in order to bring home more income.  By doing this they will be able to give their children a decent and respectable life.

Ignancia has been selling clothes for several years.  That is why she has steady customers.  She has a lot of demand for overcoats and other items for the coming season.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy more garments to stock up on the products that she sells.  She will buy things like sweaters, sweatshirts, hats, and more.  She has faith that the loan will be a big help.

loans.use: to buy sweaters, sweatshirts, hats, and more.

loans.name: Milagro De La Paz

texts.es:
Milagro, tiene 25 años de edad, es soltera, vive con sus padres y dos hermanos, ella se dedica al procesamiento y comercio de lácteos, lleva 4 años en este negocio el cual aprendió de su madre, su forma de trabajar es primeramente comprando la leche a ganaderos vecinos, ella se encarga de procesarla y vender los productos en su vivienda.
Actualmente necesita un préstamo para comprarse leche en mayor cantidad, pues desea aumentar la producción de cuajada, quesos frescos, con esta ayuda del préstamo se hará realidad el proyecto de mejorar sus ventas y ganancias en el negocio.
Su objetivo es continuar creciendo con el negocio, ayudar a sus padres y poder en un futuro construir su propia casa y formar su familia.
texts.en:
Milagro is 25 years old and single.  She lives with her parents and her two brothers, and she works in processing and selling dairy products.  She has been in this business, which she learned from her mother, for four years.  The way she works is to first buy milk from neighboring cattle, she is responsible for processing it and sells the products from her home.

Currently she needs a loan to buy a greater quantity of milk, because she wants to increase her production of curd and fresh cheeses.  With the help of this loan she will be able to achieve her project of improving sales and profits in her business.

Her goal is to continue to grow the business, to help her parents and in the future, to build her own home and start a family.

loans.use: to buy milk so she can process it and sell dairy products.

loans.name: Mujeres Al Triunfo 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Juana is the coordinator of her group Mujeres al triunfo 1 & 2 (Women to victory). She makes her home here in a simple structure with her long-term partner. She says that her biggest challenge is to have savings so that  if her grown children need something, she could proviD. it and have a better living standard. This is her first loan with Esperanza. 

Juana has had her business for almost two years. Using some savings she started selling fried food and now she has a Pica Pollo (fried chicken restaurant), where the principal dish is chicken with fried plantains or potatoes. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying many pounds of chicken, plantains, potatoes and cooking oil. Also she will purchase chairs and tables. She will use the profits to save and reinvest in her business.

Her group is located in the urban slums surrounding Santo Domingo and is composed of 10 people.

loans.use: to buy chicken, plantains, cooking oil, etc.

loans.name: Jose Dorance

texts.es:
Jose Dorance siempre se ha caracterizado por ser un hombre trabajador y responsable, siempre se ha dedicado a venta de mercancía, sin embargo desde hace varios años el se dedica a venta de frutas.

Su negocio se caracteriza por el aseo, el orden y la buena calidad de sus productos, él trabaja con su esposa desde muy temprano en la mañana. Este negocio le permite sostener su familia y darles una mejor calidad de vida.

José quiere incrementar sus ventas y para esto necesita tener un surtido mas grande de frutas y hacerle unos arreglos a local para tener una mejor distribución, de esta manera sus clientes compran muchas mas frutas y además tendrá nuevos clientes.
texts.en:
José Dorance has always been characterized as a hardworking and responsible man. He has always made a living in merchandise sales, however, for several years now he has sold fruit.

His business is noted for its cleanliness, orderliness and the good quality of his products. He works with his wife, starting very early in the morning. This business allows him to support his family and give them a better quality of life. 

José wants to increase his sales and to do that he needs to have a larger assortment of fruit and make some repairs to the shop to have better distribution. This way his clients will buy a lot more fruit and he will also get new customers.

loans.use: to purchase a wider variety of fruits for his store

loans.name: Silvina

texts.es:
La señora Silvina, tiene 38 años de edad, su pareja desde hace tiempo es señor Lorenzo, con quien tiene 2 hijos pequeños. Ellos viven en su casa propia que está situada en la ciudad de Encarnación.
La señora Silvina es comerciante desde hace varios años, ella se dedica a la venta de mercaderías de varios tipos tales como: colchas, sabanas y otros;  tiene mucha clientela en la zona de Encarnación, ya que a muchos de sus clientes les distribuye por pedido. Su esposo, que también es comerciante, la ayuda en las ventas. Gracias a estas actividades ellos han podido educar a sus hijos, mantener su hogar y solventar cualquier imprevisto que se le presente.
Ella solicitada el crédito para la compra de más mercaderías, tales como colchas, sabanas, frazadas y demás, ya que tiene pedidos de sus clientes los cuales le gustaría cumplir.
texts.en:
Silvina, 38, has a longtime partner, Lorenzo, with whom she has two small children.  They live in their own house located in the city of Encarnacion.

Silvina has worked in retail trade for a number of years.  She sells a variety of merchandise such as: bedspreads, bed sheets and other items.  She has a lot of customers in the area of Encarnacion, and for many of them she delivers merchandise that they have ordered in advance. Her husband, who is also a merchant, helps her with her sales.  Thanks to these activities they have been able to educate their children, maintain their home and cover any unexpected expenses.

Silvina requests a loan to buy more merchandise such as bedspreads, bed sheets, blankets and other items, since she has orders from her customers that she would like to fill.

loans.use: to buy bedspreads, bed sheets, blankets and other items

loans.name: Santos Isabel

texts.es:
Santos, vive con sus tres hijas de 10, 8 y 4 años de edad, él se dedica a la elaboración de hamacas, aprendió este oficio hace 12 años con sus padres, trabaja con mas personas en la elaboración de hamacas, también sus hijas mayores le colaboran en ocasiones, su horario de trabajo es de 8:00am a 4:00pm.
El solicita un préstamo para la compra de hilo para elaborar hamacas, esta inversión le permitirá continuar en la confección de las hamacas, cubriendo la demanda de una mejor manera y generando mejores ingresos.
Los sueños de don Santos es que sus hijas crezcan, aprendan el oficio y puedan estudiar, ya que así podrán defenderse en el futuro.
texts.en:
Santos lives with his three daughters who are 10, 8 and 4 years of age.  He makes hammocks.  He learned this occupation 12 years ago with his parents.  He works with other people making hammocks.  His older daughters sometimes help out too.  His work schedule is 8am to 4pm.

He is asking for a loan to buy string to make hammocks.  This investment will allow him to continue making hammocks better meeting demand and generating better income.

Santos’ dreams are that his daughters grow up, that they learn an occupation and be able to go to school so that they will be able to fend for themselves in the future.

loans.use: to buy string to weave hammocks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, pork, cheese and gas to make her pupusas

loans.name: Hugo

texts.es:
El Sr. Hugo tiene 34 años de edad y está soltero.
Él se dedica a la venta de leche, hace mas 11 años, aproximadamente desde el año 2.000. Proviene de una familia que se dedica a esa actividad, es decir desde pequeño realizaba esta actividad con sus padres, por lo cual ya tiene una vasta experiencia en el tema.
El cliente tiene su propio establecimiento que esta explotando con la cría de ganados, que los cuales luego obtiene la leche. En la actualidad vende sus productos a los comercios de la zona. Tiene como principal objetivo, aumentar su producción y contar con maquinarias modernas para el ordeñe de sus vacas de tal manera poder brindar una vida digna a sus padres.
El solicita el credito para la compra de mas ganado para poder seguir con el crecimiento de su negocio, como así también alimentos para los mismos.
texts.en:
Hugo is 34 years old and single.  He has sold milk for over 11 years, since about the year 2000.  He comes from a family dedicated to this activity.  That is, he’s been doing this job since he was a little boy with his parents.  Because of this, he has vast experience in the matter.

He has his own establishment that he’s using to raise cattle from which he gets the milk.  He currently sells his products to stores in the area.  His main objective is to increase production and to have modern milking machines so that he can provide a dignified life for his parents.

He is asking for the loan to buy more cattle as well as feed for them to continue expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy more dairy cattle.

loans.name: Sandra Margarita

texts.es:
Sandra Margarita desde varios años tiene un negocio de comidas donde vende empanadas, pasteles, buñuelos, ella con este negocio se ha podido sotener económicamente ya que no tiene apoyo de su ex esposo no le da ayuda para sostener la familia.

Ella necesita ampliar su negocio para poder así darle a su pequeña niña de 6 años una mejor calidad de vida, además para poder seguir pagándole sus estudios.
texts.en:
Sandra Margarita has had a food sales business for several years.  She sells turnovers, cakes, fried tortillas.  She’s been able to support herself economically through this business because her ex-husband does not contribute anything for the family’s support.

She needs to enlarge the business in order to provide her young, 6-year-old, daughter with a better quality of life as well as to continue paying for her schooling.

loans.use: to buy a deep fryer and ingredients.

loans.name: Bibiana Patricia

texts.es:
Desde hace 8 años Bibiana trabaja con su tía en el restuarante de ella, sin embargo al enfermar la tía Bibiana se resposabilizó del negocios y hoy es la dueña de este desde hace ya 2 años.

Ella trabaja largas jornadas ya que necesita pagarle los estudis a su hija ya que no tiene un apoyo del padre de su hija. 

Bibiana quiere que su negocios siempre este bien y que sus clientes se sientan contentos con la comida y el servicio, por esto quiere tener masyo surtido de insumos para asi poder ofrecerle a sus clientes variedad en las comidas, además asi mejora la calidad de vida de su hija por el incremento en sus ventas.
texts.en:
Bibiana has worked in her aunt’s restaurant for the last 8 years.  However, when her aunt became ill Bibiana took over responsibility for the entire business and she’s been the owner now for the past two years.  She works long work days because she needs to pay for her daughter’s schooling and she gets no support from her daughter’s father.

Bibiana wants her business to be good always and that her customers feel happy with the food and the services.  Because of this she wants to have a better stock of ingredients to provide her customers with more variety of dishes.  Besides, with an increase in sales her daughter’s quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: La Seriedad Group

texts.es:
Luz Benita es miembro del Grupo Solidario La Seriedad, es comerciante, tiene 43 años de edad, es madre soltera de cuatro hijos y junto a ellos reside en la Comunidad de San Nicolas. Muchos años atras su padre le prestó 500 lempiras y con eso compró algo de ropa de segunda mano para luego vendersela a sus vecinos, de sus ventas le quedaba algo de ganancia y volvia a comprar mercaderia. 

Despues de un tiempo se dio cuenta de FAMA y solicitó un prestamo el cual le fue otorgado y con eso pudo cambiar de negocio. Ahora Luz se dedica a la venta de condimentos, y aprendió de una de sus hermanas, ésta se dedicaba al negocio y le iba muy bien. 

Tres de sus cuatro hijos la ayudan a preparar los condimientos y luego ella sale a las Aldeas cercanas a venderlos, se transporta a jalon, sale a la calle y espera que alguien conocido pase y la lleve. Las ventas las realiza cada 15 dias pero en su casa vende de forma permanente. Sus mayores dificultades son el clima y que cuando no encuentra a nadie que le de jalon tiene que caminar grandes distancias. 

Con el apoyo del prestamo comprará condimentos como ser: achiote, especias, canela, clavos de olor, romero, linaza, y tambien comprar bolsitas, grapas para el empaque. Con el apoyo de este prestamo podrá surtir su negocio y espera que sus ventas aumenten. Su meta es seguir apoyando a sus hijos para que estos se graduen, dos de ellos ya lo hicieron gracias a su esfuerzo laboral. 

Luz es clienta de FAMA por 15 ciclos y es puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.
texts.en:
Luz Benita is a member of the La Seriedad communal bank. She is a 43-year-old shopkeeper and single mother of four children. She lives with her children in the community of San Nicolas. Many years ago her father lent her 500 lempiras and with that she bought some second hand clothing to later resell it to her neighbors. She made a profit from her sales and then bought more merchandise.  

After a while she became aware of FAMA and requested a loan which she was granted and with that she was able to change her business. Now Luz earns her living selling seasonings, which she learned from one of her sisters who was in the business and did very well. 

Three of her four children help her prepare the seasonings and later she goes out to the nearby villages to sell them. She travels by hitchhiking. She goes out to the street and waits until someone she knows passes by and picks her up. She makes her sales every 15 days but she also makes sales from her house permanently. Her biggest obstacles are the weather and, when she is unable to find a ride, having to walk long distances.

With the support of this loan she will buy seasonings such as annatto, spices, cinnamon, cloves, rosemary, linseed, as well as little bags and staples for packaging. She will be able to supply her business with the support of this loan and she hopes her sales increase. Her goal is to continue supporting her children so that they will graduate. Two of them already have graduated thanks to her effort. 

Luz has been a client of FAMA for 15 loan cycles and she is punctual with her repayments.

loans.use: to purchase seasonings.

loans.name: Hector Dario

texts.es:
Hector Dario trabaja en construcción desde hace muchos años, sin emnargo para incrementar sus ingresos decidió tener un puesto para vender dulces, mecato y cigarrillos en la calle, con estos ingresos adicionales puede mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y la de él.

El quiere tener mas suirtido en su negocios para poder tener mas clientes y además poder ofrecerles otros productos que sean del agrado de los transeuntes.

Su sueño es poder tener una tienda para asi dejar la construcción y poder dedicarse a su negocio y dejarle éste a su familia.
texts.en:
Hector Dario has worked in construction for many years, however in order to increase his income he decided to have a stall to sell sweets, packed lunches and cigarettes on the street. With this additional income he is able to increase his and his family's quality of life.

He wants to have a greater stock in his businesses in order to be able to have more customers and to be able to offer other products that will appeal to passersby.

His dream is to be able to have a store in order to leave the construction business and dedicate himself to his business and leave it to his family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies

loans.name: Chonimacorral Group

texts.es:
La señora Paulina Susana es casada, tienen 28 años D. edad, curso el quinto grado D. educación primaria, tiene una hija pequeña que aun no estudia,  se dedica a la confección D. delantales típicos y también a la crianza D. animales domésticos, inició criando pollos y hasta el momento lleva 6 años D. experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo D. su esposo quien se dedica a la albañilería.

DeciD. organizar un grupo para solicitar un préstamo para invertirlo para la compra D. cerdos para crianza, ya que espera tener una granja. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a diversas actividades: crianza D. animales, confección D. prendas, y el señor se dedica a la albañilería. Esperan alcanza su objetivos con el préstamo que están haciendo.
texts.en:
Mrs Paulina Susana is married, 28, and finished the fifth graD. of elementary school. She has one small daughter who is not yet in school. She makes traditional aprons and also raises domestic animals. She started off raising chickens, and currently has 6 years' experience. Her husband, a bricklayer, supports her.

She has decided to organize a group in order to request a loan to invest in the purchase of hogs for raising, since she hopes to have a farm. The other group members have diverse businesses: raising animals, making garments; and the man is a bricklayer. They hope to achieve their goals with this loan.

loans.use: to purchase hogs

loans.name: Carlita

texts.en:
Carlita is married and has two children. She is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines.

Carlita is a farmer and grows corn to earn a living. She has been doing this for five years. 

Carlita has been a member of PMPC for six years. She has requested a loan for 20,000 PHP to purchase materials to repair her house.

loans.use: to purchase materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Unidas En El Trabajo Group

texts.es:
Sebastiana pertenece al grupo “UNIDAS EN EL TRABAJO”  integra el grupo cerca D. un año,  son  9 socias todas tratan D. salir adelante cada una en su negocio respectivo, ella se dedica a la venta D. pan  el cual reparte por varias zonas del distrito ella empezó a trabajar debido a la enfermedad D. su esposo y por sacar adelante a sus  05 hijos  lo que gana no es mucho pero es una ayuda para algunos gastos D. la casa y para terminar la construcción D. su casa  algo que quiere lograr en el tiempo mas corto con su préstamo quiere mejorar su negocio y añadir a la venta D. pan  la venta D. pasteles D. esa manera tener mas clientela y  variedad para ofrecer.

  *Sebastiana es la segunda D. la derecha viste chaleco rosado.
texts.en:
Sebastiana has belonged to the "Unidas en el Trabajo" ["United in Work"] group for about one year. There are 9 members in total and each one tries to get ahead in her own business. Sebastiana sells bread, which she distributes in various zones in the district. She started to work because her husband was ill, and in order to get her 5 children ahead. She does not earn much, but it helps with the household costs and with the termination of their home's construction. She hopes that this will occur soon. With this loan, she wants to improve her business and start selling bread and pastries. This way, she will have more customers and a greater variety to offer.

   *Sebastiana is the second on the right, wearing a pink jacket.

loans.use: to purchase cakes

loans.name: Mujeres Virtuosas Group

texts.es:
El Sr. Mario tiene 57 años es un prospero trabajador tiene un taller de planchado y pintura “MAC”  que son las iniciales de su nombre,  el taller lo tiene en su misma casa  esto  le permite no ausentarse y estar con su familia por mucho tiempo el Sr., Mario trabajo para otras personas pero decidió abrirse solo y no se equivoco a pesar que al inicio fue difícil logro consolidarse y  tener mucha clientela, sus clientes confían en el su trabajo le ha permitido velar por su familia , en la actualidad esta por iniciar un nuevo negocio en el rubro de comidas para esto esta ambientando un lugar en su casa para poner su restaurante con su préstamo comprara los  utensilios de cocina y otros enseres en el mes de agosto estará inaugurando su local, sabe que le ira bien por ser un lugar estratégico donde hay mucha fluidez de publico, actualmente es presidente del grupo “MUJERES VIRTUOSAS”  que esta formado por  07 socios.

  * El Sr. Mario esta sentado el ultimo de la derecha.
texts.en:
Mario is 57 years old.  He is a prosperous worker who owns a panel beating and painting workshop called "MAC" (which are the initials of his name).  His workshop is located in his home which allows him to spend a lot of time with his family.  For a long time, Mario worked for other people.  However, he decided to open his own business and this turned out to be a good decision, in spite of the fact that it was difficult at first to consolidate his business and gain a lot of customers.

Mario's customers trust his work and, through his work, he has been able to look after his family.  He is currently about to start a new business preparing food.  He has set up a restaurant in his home and he will use his loan to buy cooking utensils and other equipment.  He will open his new business in the month of August.  He knows that his business will do well because it is located in a strategic position where there are a lot of passersby.

Mario is currently the president of the 'Mujeres Virtuosas' (Virtuous Women) group which has seven members.

* Mario is the man who is sitting on the far right of the photo.

loans.use: to buy cooking utensils and equipment

loans.name: Lito

texts.en:
Lito is 45 years old and lives in Lamao, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte. He is married and has five children.

Lito works in the fish industry and catches and sells fish for living. He had been doing this for 10 years. He earns 13,000 PHP each month in doing this activity. 

Lito has been a member of PMPC for over year. He has requested a loan for 50,000 PHP to purchase materials for his fish cage.

In the future, Lito hopes to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase materials for his fish cage.

loans.name: Martina

texts.en:
Martina is married and has seven children. She is 65 years old and lives in Upper Inuman, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte.

Martina runs a sari-sari (variety) story where she sells canned goods and other daily needs such as shampoo, soap, toothpaste, oil, soy sauce, etc., to earn a living. She has had this business for three years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of work.

Martina has been a member of PMPC for four years. She has requested a loan for 2,000 PHP to purchase products to resell. 

In the future, Martina hopes to make her sari-sari store bigger.

loans.use: to purchase goods to resell at her store.

location.town: Upper Inuman, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca is 54 years old and lives in Gusa, Calatunan, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte.  She is married with 12 children.

To earn a living, Francisca has a business selling different kind of products.  She earns about PHP 8,000 each month doing this type of work. Francisca has requested a loan for PHP 4,000 to purchase different kinds of products such as mineral water, boiled egg, etc.

Francisca has been a member of PMPC for 4 years. In the future, Francisca would like to make her business grow.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of products such as mineral water, boiled egg, etc.

location.town: Gusa, Calatunan, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Tsetsegmaa

texts.en: Tsetsegmaa is 41 years old and lives with her husband and daughter in a ger, a Mongolian yurt, in Uvs province of Mongolia. Her daughter who is 17 goes to a secondary school. Tsetsegmaa manages a meat trading business with the help of her husband. She started her business with working capital of 500,000 MNT in 2004. Since then she has been able to build a strong customer base and managed to increase her working capital to 2,500,000 MNT. She has great confidence that she can expand and continue her business successfully. She is a hardworking lady who says, "During National Holidays sales gets higher so I need to increase my inventories before that." Tsetsegmaa is requesting a 3,000,000 MNT loan to purchase livestock for her business.

loans.use: To purchase livestock

loans.name: Virgie

texts.en: Virgie is 52 years old and lives in New Calamba, Kalawit, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 8 children. Virgie has a general store and earns approximately 3000 each month. She has requested a loan of 7000 to purchase more stock for her store. Virgie has been a member of PMPC for a year. In the future, she hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: to purchase more stock for her general store

location.town: New Calamba, Kalawit, Zamboanga Del Norte

loans.name: Beverly

texts.en: Beverly is 39 years old and lives in Dansalan, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with four children. To earn a living, Beverly has a business selling a rice product. She earns about 3000 each month. Beverly has a requested a loan for additional capital. Beverly has been a member of PMPC for over a year. In the future, Beverly would like to expand her business.

loans.use: to add to her capital

loans.name: Nhelajean

texts.en: Nhelajean is 33 years old and lives in Balok, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with 3 children. To earn a living, Nhelajean has a business selling fish. She earns about PHP 5,000 each month. Nhelajean has requested a loan of 5000 to repair her motorcycle used for the selling fish. Nhelajean has been a member of PMPC for two years. In the future, Nhelajean would like to have a better standard of living.

loans.use: to repair her motorcycle used for selling fish

loans.name: Katerina

texts.ru:
Катерина не замужем. Она живет вместе со своей младшей сестрой в двухкомнатной квартире. Катерина занимается продажей мужской одежды. Этот бизнес  является основным и главным доходом  для нее.

Катерина имеет свою точку в торговом центре на первом этаже.  У нее большой ассортимент и хорошие цены. Катерина трудолюбивая и целеустремленная. Ее бизнес цель - открытие второй торговой точки
.
Катерина просит предоставить ей кредит в сумме 9,000 гривен на приобретение мужской сезонной одежды: футболки и шорты. Полученную прибыль она планирует инвестировать обратно в бизнес для его расширения.
texts.en:
Katerina is not married. She lives together with her younger sister in a two bedroom apartment. Katerina sells men's clothing. This business is the main and important source of income for her.

Katerina has her own vendor location in the first floor of a trade center. She has a large selection and good prices. Katerina is a hard worker and purposeful. Her business goal is to open a second location.

Katerina is asking to give her a loan in the amount of 9,000 hrivnas to buy men's seasonal clothing: t-shirts and shorts. She plans to invest the earned profit back into her business for it's growth.

loans.use: to buy seasonal merchandise - t-shirts and shorts

loans.name: Batulzii

texts.en: Batulzii is 40 years old and lives with his wife and son in a house in Ulaanbaatar city. His son who is 17 years old attends secondary school. Batulzii manages a used furniture business with the help of his wife at Narantuul, one of the biggest markets in Mongolia. He started his business in 1997 and has been able to expand. He imports used furniture from Korea. Now his business sales exceed 800,000 MNT in a week. Last year he was able to buy a car with his business earnings.
